description: ✔ StockSpy keeps getting more awesome with FREE upgrades! StockSpy - A slick Phone & Tablet app which simplifies tracking stocks, the stock market, realtime stock quotes, charts, news, links & stats for stocks around the globe. StockSpy allows you to SEE how the news affects stock prices with NewsCharts! ♦ WARNING ♦ STOCKSPY IS A RESEARCH TOOL. IT IS NOT INTENDED FOR PERFORMING FULL TECHNICAL ANALYSIS! - Please Note you get StockSpy for Tablet and Phone in a single purchase! The last thing we want to do is trick you into buying something you aren’t actually looking for. That said we think the vast majority of investors will benefit from using StockSpy! TONS OF USEFUL FEATURES ✔ NEW: Track portfolio value and trades across all of your devices with cloud sync. ✔ Designed for Android Phones + Tablets! ✔ Works for stocks on Tons of Exchanges around the world! ✔ Real time quotes and volume from major exchanges: NASDAQ, NYSE, AMEX, London, Germany, Italy, Taiwan. ✔ The up/down ticks in live real time prices are highlighted in green/red. ✔ Landscape Mode: Beautiful and clear full screen stock charts & news. ✔ Technical Indicators: Candle Stick Charts, SMA, EMA, Bollinger Bands and Parabolic SAR ✔ Symbol Groups: Custom named watchlists to help organize the stocks in your portfolio. ✔ Sortable symbol lists: Sort by ticker symbol or stock price percentage change. ✔ Real time Intraday Charts: In stocks list & symbol details. ✔ Time Saving Links: Organizes web links related to your stocks for quick investment research. Never have to type in a URL again. Setup a link template once for your whole portfolio. ✔ Full Screen Charts and Browser: Instantly toggle to full screen for charting or reading news articles about your stocks. ✔ Symbol List Company Logos help you quickly spot the stock you’re looking for. ✔ If stock price changes more than ±2% quote shows a darker green or red or green background. ✔ Integrated Stats & fundamental stock data: + Dividends: Per share, Yield, Ex Dividend, Pay Date + Ratios/Other: PE, Price/Sales, PEG, Book Value, EPS, EBITDA, Short Ratio + Price History: 52 wk range and % change. AMAZING NEWS FEATURES ✔ NewsCharts lets you to visualize news volume over time to spot correlations with price changes! ✔ Auto news feed configuration. ✔ Customize News Sources RSS/Atom address templates. ie. add a twitter feed tracking tweets about your stocks. ✔ Single list Multi news feed consolidation. Avoid jumping between finance websites to find all the news on your investments! ✔ Read articles in integrated browser or long press for external browser. ✔ Grey marking of Read articles. ✔ Easy feed setup for: Yahoo Finance!, Google Finance, MarketWatch, SeekingAlpha, FOX Business ... etc. CLOUD SYNC Automatically syncs your Stock Watchlist, News Feeds & Links on every device... ✔ Android Phone or Tablet, iPhone, iPad, Mac. ✔ If your device is lost or damaged you can restore data related to your stocks from the cloud using your StockSpy account! STOCK EXCHANGES - Supports Tons of exchanges around the world to access your stocks.. ✔ Americas NASDAQ, NYSE, AMEX, Pink Sheets & OTC BB, TSX, TSXV, Mexico, Argentina, BOVESPA ✔ Europe/Middle East London, Paris, Frankfurt, Madrid MCATS, Milano, Vienna, Swiss, Amsterdam, Copenhagen, Stockholm, Oslo, Tel Aviv. ✔ Asia/Pacific Australia, New Zealand Stock Exchange, Jakarta, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Bombay. With recent volatility in the global financial markets access to timely investment information is a necessity. With StockSpy this information is at your fingertips. With a single purchase you can install StockSpy on your Phone and Tablet! UPDATES ALWAYS FREE! SUPPORT: Contact support@stock-spy.com anytime! Go ahead! Get your copy of StockSpy today. You won't regret it!
release_text: -Stability improvements and bug fixes. -Symbol trades now lets you select the group to record trades for a stock when a symbol is copied in multiple groups. -Fixes for freezing at launch -Fixes & Improvements for quotes. -Fix to address lack of access. -Added portfolio trades tracking with cloud sync support! -Fixed bar dates. -Now with intraday candle stick charts! -Cloud Sync: You must update StockSpy on all devices to work with the new cloud sync schema!

description: Awarded Best Software in Utilities category for 2011 Remotely access your video camera, digital video recorder, network recorder and webcam. Over 1900+ devices supported. Use Scan Camera to automatically find compatible driver. http://hit-mob.com/android_device_support_list.html New! Android Wear and multiple TV platform support. Built-in web server enables remote control of the app to change record mode settings away from home or for use as a video wall or function as a transcoder to fetch frames from devices with proprietary protocols. Motion Detection built into app works with all cameras. Play sound when motion is detected. Record only when motion is detected in Record Mode (email notification optional). Record Mode that turns any spare Android device into a solid state, battery backed 24/7 video recorder for your standalone IP cameras. Allows playback, search and export to video clip file. Background Audio Mode keeps playing audio even when you switch away to other apps or lock the screen for use as baby monitor. With 5+ years of development there are so many features they won't let me describe them properly so here's an overview. Wide protocol and video format support including HTTPS, RTSP and ONVIF. Features include matrix view, pan tilt zoom, home/lock screen widgets, grouping, encryption and in-app motion detection. Upgrade features include 2-way audio, background audio, record mode with remote control and notifications.
release_text: - more drivers and driver fixes - Chromecast support (More Actions) - Recall recent motion events in Record Playback - Android Wear / TV support - homescreen shortcuts - add homescreen shortcut for camera or group - embedded web server navigation of recent motion events - optional timestamp when converting to video file - add convert video to animated GIF - motion detection sensitivity setting - Android 5.1 tweaks

description: プロ野球ファン必携のアプリとして、超人気ゲームが装い新たに登場!! あのパワプロ、プロスピのKONAMIが送る、プロ野球ゲームの決定版!! 好きな選手を集め、キミだけのドリームナインで戦え！ 公式戦の試合速報や野球ファン垂涎のプロ野球ニュースも配信！ プロ野球の全てがココにある!!! 【ドリナイSSとは?】 ◇ゲーム×野球ニュース＝ドリナイSS 野球ファン垂涎のプロ野球ニュースや成績ランキングはもちろん、公式戦の試合速報も配信！ ゲームをしつつ最新のプロ野球情報をチェックできるのはドリナイSSだけ！ ◇プロ野球選手が実写で登場!! 実際のプロ野球のペナント成績に基づいた選手たちが実写フィギュアとなって登場！ 各球団主な収録選手はこちら！（敬称略） ＜パ・リーグ＞ 福岡ソフトバンクホークス(柳田悠岐 / 松田宣浩 / 内川聖一 等) オリックス・バファローズ(金子千尋 / 糸井嘉男 / 佐藤達也 等) 北海道日本ハムファイターズ(大谷翔平 / 中田翔 / 陽岱鋼 等) 千葉ロッテマリーンズ(西野勇士 / 鈴木大地 / 石川歩 等) 埼玉西武ライオンズ(中村剛也 / 岸孝之 / メヒア 等) 東北楽天ゴールデンイーグルス(則本昂大 / 嶋基宏 / 松井稼頭央 等) ＜セ・リーグ＞ 読売ジャイアンツ(菅野智之 / 阿部慎之助 / 坂本勇人 等) 阪神タイガース(鳥谷敬 / メッセンジャー / ゴメス 等) 広島東洋カープ(前田健太 / 菊池涼介 / 大瀬良大地 等) 中日ドラゴンズ(山井大介 / 大島洋平 / 福谷浩司 等) 横浜DeNAベイスターズ(梶谷隆幸 / 筒香嘉智 / 久保康友 等) 東京ヤクルトスワローズ(山田哲人 / バレンティン / 小川泰弘 等) ◇毎日開催のリーグ戦で本格シミュレーション 平日開催のレギュラーシーズンで順位を競え! 週末の熾烈なリーグ入れ替え戦で上位リーグを目指そう! ◇敏腕スカウトからのレポート報告?! 選手の特徴が書かれたスカウトレポートで優秀な選手を探し出せ! 曲者ぞろいのスカウトと契約して目当ての選手をGET!! ◇成長のカギは試合にある!! 選手たちは試合を重ねるごとにどんどん成長するぞ! 作戦や選手の組み合わせは無限大、いろんなオーダーを試してみよう! 試合後には新たなスカウトが見つかることも…?! キミだけのドリームナインでリーグの頂点を目指そう! 日本野球機構承認、日本プロ野球名球会公認、データ提供:データスタジアム　情報提供:　スタッツ・ジャパン ---------------------------------------- ・本アプリはオンラインゲームです。通信可能な環境でお楽しみください。 ・対応OS：Android4.0以降 ・推奨RAMサイズ：1GB以上 ・動作確認端末： GALAXY S4 SC-04E Xperia A SO-04E AQUOS PAD SH-08E AQUOS PHONE ZETA SH-02E ARROWS Me F-11D ARROWS X F-10D、 GALAXY NEXUS SC-04D GALAXY S III SC-06D GALAXY S III α SC-03E GALAXY Tab 7.7 Plus SC-01E ※上記端末以外は動作保証対象外となります。 ※動作確認端末以外でのトラブルにつきましてはサポート対象外となります。あらかじめご了承ください。 ---------------------------------------- As a professional baseball fan must-have app, newly appeared! description: Learn English Conversation for German speakers - With pronunciation in english learn Conversation in english in simple way Learn Conversation by basic phrases, simple and easy With pronunciation Per sentences this free package with ads but full package with no ads More than a thousand phrase in the english language All basic english sentences that you will need in your life and your transaction with people Conversation sentences about the following topics and more : + 1000 sentences Welcome and meet people Basic phrases News all the time Ages and birthdays Smoking Dealing with the traffic police Dates At the university Love and Marriage Pets Religion Sports Hours Words may see in public places The question of what does or does someone Question for contact details Question if someone Someone asked about plans Car Symptoms of the disease Healthy Eating Weather Family and Relationships Work Spinning and courtesy School Dating Music Hobbies and Interests Date and Time Living arrangements Emergency Grammy request an appointment When the doctor At home At the gas station Traffic Signs Mechanical problems Authentication of people and get to know them Bid farewell to the people Events Feelings Languages ??and communication Thanks and apologies Question and expression Talk about work FAQs Contact someone what's new ? and in 1 September we added a new subject to this app : travel conversation app included and inside it the following : Most of the phrases you will need to travel Here are some phrases that you will need when you travel, whether by land, air or sea, some of the regulations that you will see at the airport, if you want to rent a car Or reserve a hotel or if you go to the bank or you need to use the automatic exchange machine, these are some English expressions that will have to be used. About a thousand sentence in each of the following positions: Rent a car Hotel accommodation Talk to people Shopping Hotel booking in Travel by bus and train Travel by boat Air travel Travel Question for directions Food and drink Hotels and accommodation Museums and galleries Departure Fast food Passports and customs Buy tickets Phrases you may see in the market Phrases you might see at the airport Phrases may deem Phrases you may see at the train station On board In the hotel In the bank In the tourist information office In the Office of Travel A practical example in the hotel

description: Aircraft VOR provides you with a GPS based aircraft VOR instrument shown as a typical Bendix/King KI-208A instrument. It lets you 'tune' aircraft navigation Very High Frequency Omni-direction range (VOR) beacons via a worldwide database and allows you to select and track a VOR radial to or from the VOR station. It also optionally shows you your cross-track deviation in metres. Features: - Bendix/King KI-208A face - Worldwide VOR navigation database (downloaded on first use) - Digital CRS and distance to station indications - Option to display cross-track error - Filtered and smoothed display - no jitter or jumping! - Support for portrait and landscape screens - Support for multiple screen resolutions This is the free version of the app. It is supported by ads and has a five minute time limit. Upgrading to the paid version removes both of these restrictions. Usage IMPORTANT POINT 1 - Please ensure you have an active data connection when starting the app for the first time as it will attempt to download the radio navigation database. Don't use it until you know its working! Until a GPS fix is obtained, or in case of GPS fix being lost, the VOR on/off indicator will be shown and the distance to station will show ---- Tuning a station Use the app menu to select 'Tune NAV'. You will be presented with all the VOR stations within 200 nautical miles of your current location. Selecting a VOR will tune it up. Hit your devices 'Back' button when you have selected your desired VOR. Finding out which radial you currently on The first thing to remember when trying to find out which radial you are on is that all radials are from the station. The indicator is able to show you which direction to track to the station but this is not directly which radial you are on (it's 180 degrees out). To centre the needle and find the radial you are currently on, rotate the instruments compass card until the needle centres with a FROM indication. Finding out your current bearing to the station Sometimes it is necessary to obtain your current bearing to station. To obtain the bearing from your current position to the station, rotate the instruments compass card until the needle is centred and the TO flag is showing. Flying a specific radial Sometimes it is necessary to fly along a specific radial to/from the station. In this case, first select the radial you wish to fly by rotating the instruments compass card to that radial, ensuring the TO/FROM flag is in the correct sense. The VOR needle will then indicate to you which direction you need to move in order to intercept your desired radial. If the needle is to the right, fly right. If it is to the left, fly left. Upon approaching your desired radial, the needle will close into the centre. Each dot indicated on the display is 2 degrees, so the needle will start to move when you are within 10 degrees of the desired radial. You should begin to turn onto a desired course, which matches your radial so that your aircraft heading matches the desired radial when the needle is centred. You will need to compensate for wind appropriately. Displaying X-Track deviation You can display you current cross-track error in metres by toggling the menu option. This will show you the number of metres left or right of track when you close to less than 1km of your desired radial For further information check out http://www.wikihow.com/Navigate-Using-a-VOR If you like this app, please try my other aircraft/flying related apps! I'm a professional software engineer, part-time android developer and passionate private pilot so would love to hear your thoughts, feature requests and bug reports

description: ★ Weapon of Revenge update ★ Jungle Heat is a free cross-platform war game , which you can play on any device or social network. The tropics full of oil and gold are languishing under the onslaught of General Blood. Your task is to free the native riches, to rip them out of the hands of the bloodthirsty marauders and claim them for yourself! The treasures of the jungle will be safe and sound in your storages. So onward - fortify the walls, hire troops, and onward to battle! Brutal battles, military bases, wild jungles, and all this displayed with beautiful graphics, weapons, forces, and buildings, which will delight even the most ardent fans of battle games. Download today and join the battle for the treasures of the jungle. If you want to continue the game on another device or social network, go to the settings section of the game, select "OTHER DEVICE", and follow the instructions. Continue to play on other platforms without losing any progress. In Jungle Heat, you can develop your military base into an unassailable fortress, battle with other players, raze their bases to ashes, unite into invincible clans, and participate in regular tournaments. Play on any Android smartphone or tablet. Game features: > Simplicity and fun: battles are as simple as one, two, three, and what is more, each battle is unique! > Freedom of maneuver: plan out your base, upgrade buildings and troops, set up an ideal defense, and think up an effective attack! > Battles with other players: attack blindly, or take revenge on your oppressors! > Assemble an army of unique heroes, whose different capabilities can change the course of battle! Each battle they fight is saturated with an atmosphere of old school war movies. > Regular tournaments: Participate in individual and clan tournaments, show the entire world that you and your clan are the best! > Cross-platform capability: Play on social networks or on any mobile device; > Bright, colorful graphics: an explosion of color in the jungle! > Dynamic music: an atmosphere of endless tropical fun! If you like Jungle Heat, don't forget to give it five stars. Do you have questions or need help? Check the FAQ or write to us, we will help you: http://support.my.com/games/kb/jh/ Join our communities: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JungleHeatGame Twitter: https://twitter.com/JungleHeatGame G+: https://plus.google.com/communities/108807702404548446353 Attention! A reliable internet connection is required for Jungle Heat. Attention! The game requires READ_PHONE_STATE permission in order to save your game's progress. In the event that the game is deleted or lost in any way, you will always be able to restart the game and restore your saved progress. We use a device identifier only to save the progress of the game, and not for anything else.

description: Clumsy Dentist Fiasco is all about root canals, teeth cleaning, germ removal and fillings to get charming smile & healthy teeth. It’s a virtual surgery dentist game to get rid of dentist fear from kids. Dentist games for kids! Enjoy acting like professional dentists in this fun and educational virtual dentist surgery game. Use advanced tools and methods to treat the patient’s teeth at dentist’s office. Before getting on braces or a tooth extraction, root canal is a must thing. Use your medical skills, be the crazy doctor and treat your patients like a professional. Tooth cleaning can solve most of the oral problems like a bad breath, ugly teeth and tooth decay. You might occasionally see a celebrity patient at your hospital waiting to get a dental treatment done by you. √ Features • Select a patient who wants to have a dental treatment • You can see full face of the patient now. Clear the dirt from patient’s teeth, mouth and tongue • Clean the dirt with a machine • Use a tooth pick cleaner to clean the leftover dirt • Pop the germs • Pick a golden tooth and put it on the empty space on gums (tooth replantation) • Take an xray • Zoom in the mouth to see the tooth closely • Fill in the centre of the tooth (dental filling) • Now brush the patient’s teeth to give him shiny and sparkling teeth This is the best dental learning game for your kid. Root canal is the basis of every extraction, tooth replantation, dental filling, rotten teeth extraction and teeth drilling. So learn to root canal your patient’s teeth, kill the small germs, give him a perfect smile and shiny sparkling teeth. This classic clumsy dentist app has all the fun and medical knowledge that a virtual dentist surgery game should have. We make such doctor games so that your child can get to know more about this profession and forget the dentist fear they usually have. √ Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/HammerheadGame √ Disclaimer This free game contains ads.

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Sorcière voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android

description: Timetable App for Body&Soul 2014. This app uses data from Clashfinder (clashfinder.com). Loading the Data: On first start, the app will check for a network connection and if there is connectivity will download the data from clashfinder. Once the data is loaded there is no need for network as the data is cached. If you have network connectivity on site you can reload the clashfinder data in the Tools section. There is also a setting to check for updated timetables on start up. This will stop checking once the timetable is finalised. You can turn this off in the Tools section. Features - Allows for creation of itinerary - Allows for reminders of acts about to start with a 30 minute warning notification. - Shows clash indicator where itinerary entries overlap The clashfinder data used is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 The graphic is copyright Body&Soul 2014

app_name: 原稿作文 ‐ 縦書エディタ
description: 縦書と横書で大容量（400字詰原稿用紙3000枚以上）の小説や論文などの文書を編集出来ます。 「２画面分割」・「構成索引」・「付箋」・「手帖」機能等で大文書の編集を容易にしています。 試用中は保存文書文字数等の制限がありますが、全ての機能をお試し頂けます。 『原稿作文Key登録』のご購入で、全ての機能制限が解除されます。 「環境設定」で基本・ビュー・編集の各環境が細かく設定出来ます。 20頁を超える、詳しい操作ヘルプがありますので、インスト後に必ずお読みください。 ◎機能について 　本アプリは作文用の真の「道具」を必要とされる方へ向け開発されています。 有償Key登録前は保存容量制限が在り、実用にするには『原稿作文Key登録』のご購入が必要です。 無償の「道具」を望む方、メモ程度の簡単な編集環境を求める方には適していませんので、インストなさらないでください。 外付けキーボードの基本キー操作に対応しています。 縦書と云う特殊な編集環境実現の為「機種依存」します。端末名と不具合点をご報告頂ければ可能な限り対処致します。 ◎解像度について 　本アプリは端末の最低解像度を480x800で設計しております。それ以下の低解像度機ですと、動作はしますが、設定ボタン等が正常に表示されません。 ◎レビューについて 「無償で使えないから星一つ」と云う無益なレビューはご容赦ください。 単に「判らない・使いにくい」だけでなく、欠点をご指摘頂ければ改善に努めますので、よろしくお願い致します。
release_text: ◆ﾋﾞｭｰ画面に表示分割機能を実装しました。150603 ◆Android4.2以降の表示障害を改修しました。150528 ◆PDF作成にｺﾞｼｯｸ・太字指定とﾒｰﾙ送信機能を実装しました。150518 ◆「印刷ﾌｧｲﾙ」にPDFﾌｧｲﾙ作成機能を実装しました。150508 ◆「印刷ﾌｧｲﾙ」に書式設定とﾌﾟﾚﾋﾞｭｰ機能を付けました。150426 ◆ヘルプに「FAQ・よくある質問」を付けました。150327 ◆各画面のデザインを統一・改良しました。150317 ◆ｺﾋﾟｰ･貼付に履歴機能を付けました。ｺﾋﾟｰした保存履歴から選択貼付けが出来ます。詳細は「ｺﾋﾟｰ･貼付」ヘルプをご覧ください。150222 ◆入力時の変換候補表示を改良しました。詳細は「環境設定・編集」ﾍﾙﾌﾟをご覧ください。150118 ◆外付ｷｰﾎﾞｰﾄﾞの十字方向ｷｰと+Shiftｷｰに拠るｺﾋﾟｰ・貼付(C&P)機能を実装しました。詳細は「外付KB」ﾍﾙﾌﾟをご覧ください。150111 ◆ご要望のありました、横書きに対応しました。環境設定・基本から切替えられます。141221

description: ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track If you need help with staying on task this app will do the trick. ADD / ADHD :Keeping on track is a short - term reminder system. The app is designed to help those with ADD / ADHD to focus on the task at hand. ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track allows the user to set verbal reminders and notifications on their android powered device. Using ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track is simple and straightforward. 1. Add your desired reminder. This is the reminder that will be played or spoken to you. 2. In the Repeat Every field, set the interval at which you wish to receive your notification. (Ex. If you set to 5 minutes, you will receive your notification every 5 minutes) . 3. Set your End time in the End After field. Your notification will stop once the End After time is complete. 4. The options field contains your choice of what type of notification you wish to receive. Turning the voice option on allows your device to speak the notification to you. Vibration supported devices can use the vibrate setting. By turning on the notification sound, you will receive an alert with your notification. 5. Press the test button to test your current settings. If everything is satisfactory, press start. 6. You can pause your notification by pressing the pause button. THIS ONLY PAUSES THE NOTIFICATIONS AND NOT THE END TIME. You can press the stop button at any time to stop your notification.
release_text: null

description: 3D Dice Roller app with realistic physics and high quality graphics.  Prime Dice D&D shaker contains the most complete set (over 20 types) of polyhedral dice. Intended for RPGs but can easily be used for any game that requires dice rolling such as Backgammon, Monopoly, Warhammer 40k, Yahtzee, Farkle, Craps etc. ☆Additional benefits in pro version: ✔ Ad-free, faster & smoother ✔ No limit of dice quantity on each table ✔ Tablet mode (landscape orientation) ✔ Zocchi "extra" dice types: d3, d5, d7, d9, d14, d16, d18, d24, d30 ✔ Create custom dice. Create your own specialized dice for Arkham Horror, X-Wing Star Wars (TM) dice, Zombie Dice, etc or create the Sexy Dice for erotic games! ✔ Additional coin (3 peso with Che Guevara) ✔ 10 additional dice multi-colors ✔ additional built-in backgrounds ☆ Main Features: • Create your own custom dice! • over 20 predefined dice types: d2 (coin), d3, d4, d5, d6 (numbers, pips), d7, d8, d9, d10 (0-9, 1-10, 00-90), d12, d14, d16, d18, d20, d24, d30, dF (Fudge/Fate), d8 compass • Unlimited number of cubes with different colors on each separate screen • over 20 dice colors • true physics • throw all dice or roll each die individually • bonus modifier, exploding, penetrating, drop lowest, take highest, target count, re-roll ones, blind draw dice modifiers • user can save named dice sets • adjustable dice size • play/pause button • 7 separate game screens with backgrounds • true 3D animation with custom shaders and highly optimized OpenGL ES2.0 graphics • lock selected die in place (for some games like Yahtzee) • tilt / gravity • sound, vibration feedback • tablet support • roll history • adjustable interface theme ☆ Roll methods: ✔ repeatedly tap the screen ✔ tilt / shake your phone ✔ drag / flick dice individually Permissions used: • VIBRATE lets use vibration feedback when dice collide • CHECK_LICENSE lets to check the legality of purchase • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE lets to upload user's backgrounds and to move the app to the external storage Please email me with any issues or suggestions

description: ★★★★★ “The Bard’s Tale is easily the funniest game I’ve ever played” – IGN ★★★★★ They said it couldn’t be done… a full-scale massive 3D epic role-playing game on Android! See why it’s the BIGGEST Android game ever made! The Xperia™ Edition comes with a bonus of 6K in-game gold! NOTE: Additional assets downloaded after install require at least 1.7GB of free space. RECOMMENDED DEVICE SPECIFICATION: 1GHz or higher CPU; Adreno 205, Tegra 2, SGX 540 or Mali 400 or higher GPU. “The Bard’s Tale is easily the funniest game I’ve ever played, and I’ve played all the funny games out there.” – IGN You are the Bard, a selfish rogue weary of pointless sub-quests and rat-infested cellars. Through magical song you summon characters to join you in battle, heal your party, and take damage on your behalf. Ready your weapon as you embark on a quest for coin and cleavage! “Ready your weapon and bladder as you embark on this ridiculously addicting quest and the funniest adventure of the year, The Bard’s Tale” – Game Chronicles Play The Bard’s Tale today on your favorite compatible Android device*. Prepare to immerse yourself in over 20-30 hours of adventure, featuring: • 50 enemy types (not counting bosses!) • A vast world to explore with towns, wild forests, rivers, castles, towers, secret dungeons, snowy mountains, caverns, haunted tombs and more • A full cast of bizarre NPC’s • Over a dozen special boss enemies to defeat • 16 magical characters to discover and then summon at will to aid you • Over 150 unique items of weaponry, armor, instruments, tokens, artifacts and loot! • More Song & Dance numbers than any other game, including a zombie dance-off! • Over 14 hours of outstanding voice-acting from top Hollywood talent, including Cary Elwes (The Princess Bride) as the Bard, and the inimitable Tony Jay as the Narrator But wait! That’s not all! Enjoy these great new additions in the Android version: New Features: • Autosave—option to save automatically when you near a save-book in game. • Time-Savers + 6K Gold—optional in-app purchases are available to pump up your Bard and save you time! (Note: All such items are attainable through normal game-play, with time and persistence, just as in the original console release.) Plus Xperia™ users start with 6K in-game gold that can be used to purchase time savers for free! • Includes the original classic The Bard’s Tale trilogy! + The Bard's Tale 1: Tales of the Unknown + The Bard's Tale 2: The Destiny Knight, and + The Bard's Tale 3: Thief of Fate “This game is satire in its sharpest form” – Cheat Code Central Play The Bard’s Tale today! Support: We hear you, and we are committed to improving The Bard’s Tale for Android. Please send support questions/comments through The Bard’s Tale Support link below. You are also welcome to join the discussion and get the latest news on our Facebook product page “The Bard’s Tale”. IT IS HUGE! Please note: Asset installation requires at least 1.7GB of free space on your device. Thank you for your patience with the download time. Android adaptation by Square One Games. * Compatible with Android 2.3 and higher. XPeria Play Optimized. Native Gamepad Support: o Wii Classic Controller (native or with free WiimoteController App) o Xbox 360 & Logitech F310/510/710 in X mode. o PS3 SixAxis and Dualshock (native or with SixAxis Controller App). If using Sixaxis Controller app, use default key mappings set “Enable Gamepad” option to be “ON”. o NYKO PLAYPAD & PLAYPAD PRO o MOGA Controller (with MOGA app or ObsidianX IME) SixAxis, WiiController & MOGA IMEs must be disabled to play original Bard’s Tale trilogy. description: 55+ High Quality Sounds (Including White, Brown, and Pink Noise!) ★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★ ★PLUS Version: No Ads, Less Permissions, Just Great, Relaxing Sounds :) ★More exclusive features to come! Want to relax? Turn Sleep And Noise Sounds Plus on and listen to soothing sounds like white noise or forest rain drops! Keep outside noises at bay and fall asleep quickly and easily by playing one of the many sleep time tracks in this app and of course, no need for a sound machine anymore! More sounds to be added soon, enjoy! Some of the sounds included in Sleep And Noise Sounds Plus: - Pink Noise - Helping you sleep better, this noise is said by some to be better than white noise but this sound is one where every octave carries the same frequency placing you ears in equilibrium! - Brown Noise - An excellent aid for sleep, this noise will place you in a trance allowing you to rest easy for hours on end. - White Noise - The most famous sound for sleeping peacefully in high quality is here! Always makes for a good nights rest. - Heart Beat - Babies love to hear a mother's heart beat but when mommy can't be there there's always your phone to take care of the job! Babies will be lulled to sleep by your phone. - Forest Rain - It's like having a tropical forest in your home without the environment. Enjoy soothing sounds of rain falling crisply as you lie in melancholy. - Crackling Fire - Enjoy the feeling of sitting around the fireplace or a beautiful fire in the comfort of your own bed. You don't even have to make the fire! - Ocean Waves - Quality sounds of beach ocean waves splashing into land. A simply remarkable way transition into your dreams. - Vacuum Cleaner - Loud but consistent, the sound a vacuum cleaner makes a noise that calms the chaos of the mind without as it cleans your home. - Nature Trail - Go on a journey in your dreams, but begin the journey before you enter! This nature trail recording comes fresh from a national nature trail! - Ticking Clock - The sound of a grandfather clock has never been so easy to hear and listen to. Have a listen! - Kettle Boiling - The smooth sounds of bubbling water in a kettle is just enough to give that feelingof warmth and melancholy as you relax and recline. - Airplane Midflight - Needs no explanation, the first thing most people do once mid-flight is sleep! Why not bring that environment with you all the time? Now you can! - Electric Fan - The classic way to block out unwanted noises coming from external factors. Simply cannot go wrong with sounds of an electric fan complimenting you at moments of tire. - Blowing Wind - The sound that is heard no matter what time of year, giving a feeling of comfort and relaxation. Imagine yourself within the blowing wind, without the actual wind! - Cat Purring - A cats purrr can be calm to the ears and great for complimenting an environment of comfort and melancholy. It's like having your favorite kind of animal around you all the time. - Urban Ambulance - You'd be surprised how calming the sounds of an ambulance can be when you're trying to get rest :); as long as you have this app, you can rest assured with the calm sounds of an ambulance in the distance :) And the rest of the sounds included with Sleep And Noise Sounds Plus are: Calm Rainfall, Air Conditioner, Bathing Showers, Bird Song, Blazing Fire, Bunched Leaves, Ceiling Fan, Coldwater Stream, Country Ambiance, Crickets Chirping, Deep Frying, Desert Aviary, Dryer Running, Evening Grasshoppers, Exhaust Fan, Factory Noise, Rustling Foam, Hair Dryer, Howling Wind, Keyboard Typing, Kitchen Timer, Lawn Mower, Morning Blizzard, Mountain Sounds, Moving Escalator, Nighttime Desert, Parking Garage, Pond Ducks, River Flow, Rocky Beach, Running Dishwasher, Rustling Fabric, Seagull Flock, Space Ambient, Spinning Gearchain, Tent Rainfall, Thunderstorm Ambience, Tin Roof Showers, Train Wagon, Wind Chimes, Writing Notes ★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

description: Resco Mobile CRM app is a client for Microsoft Dynamics CRM that allows you to access your data on the go. It boosts the productivity of sales people, field technicians…anyone who needs to be mobile while working. The app works in online, as well as offline mode, so you will be able to view/create/delete/modify data whenever you need it. The application does not require any middleware - just install it on your device, connect directly to your Dynamics CRM and start using it. You can create new orders or quotes, access information about accounts and contacts, schedule appointments, track phone calls and e-mails, and much more. This app is going to be your irreplaceable companion throughout the day. Features • Works seamlessly in online, as well as offline mode - you can select one of 4 modes the app will work in: Always online/ Never Online/ Online when connected to Wi-Fi/ Manual • No Middleware needed — insert Dynamics CRM URL and login credentials and you are good to go • Interactive map with navigation • Multimedia support (pictures, documents, iFrames, signatures...) • Calendar for scheduling appointments and creating tasks • Advanced find for creating personal views • Multilanguage support • Photo capturing • SharePoint support • Option to Run Reports • Adjustable filters and sorting • Encrypted database • Fully customizable IMPORTANT: For full experience, the Resco Mobile CRM app requires an access to MS Dynamics CRM server (4.0, 2011, 2013 or 2015 - on-premise/online). Without this access, you will be only able to work with the local demo database.
release_text: v8.1 • Integration with Dropbox • Synchronize before going offline option • Import contacts from phone address book • Import of vCard attachments • Asks to download attachments before replying to/forwarding an email • Shows attachments inline in the email editor, with file name and file size • Search in document list by the file name • Improved memory management during data upload • Improved Date & Time pickers • Faster loading of images

description: Lightning Bug Lightning Bug, ambience and white noise mixer. Mix some me time! Find sleep and relaxation easier with Lightning Bug, an ambience and white noise mixer for Android powered devices. Lightning Bug features a library of almost 200 sound loops and samples ranging from the natural peace of rain storms and ocean waves, to pure white noise, city trains, meditation bells, acoustic and electronic instruments, and down-tempo break beats. Lightning Bug also includes many soothing backgrounds and sound visualizations. It even has a stylish, customizable digital clock with alarm, a great replacement for your bedside alarm clock! Plugins For the full Lightning Bug experience, check out plugins. Press the puzzle piece! Having a problem with sounds and icons disappearing? The original version of Lightning Bug stored files to a generic folder on your SD card. But in the last year or so various anti-virus and disk utility apps have determined this type of storage is suspect and, in some cases, will automatically delete the contents of Lightning Bug's content folder. So, in our latest release, 2.9.8.1 as of this writing, we moved Lightning Bug's folder into protected app storage on your SD. This will prevent anti-virus and disk utility apps from deleting your icons and sounds. This means that if you're sounds and icons were already gone before installing 2.9.8.1, they will still be missing. The 2.9.8.1 update will prevent your sounds and icons from going missing again, but unfortunately you'll have to re-install your plugins one more time. We're very sorry for the inconvenience! Interested in Beta Testing? Read our tester guide for more info here: http://bit.ly/lightningbug_betaguide Features - Almost 200 sound samples and loops engineered exclusive for Lightning Bug - Over 50 soothing backgrounds and sound visualizations - Control each sound’s volume (long press the sound’s icon) - Plugin-Mode for adding lot’s of high quality new content (look for the puzzle piece!) - Control each sample sound’s playback frequency (plugin-mode only) - Customize each scene with whatever sounds you want (plugin-mode only) - Digital Clock, customize font, color, screen size, and date\time format - Alarm Clock with customizable Snooze - Local Weather - Sleep Timer w\ App Shutdown - Screen Dimmer - Screen Timeout - Supports All Screen Orientations (except upside down) - Disable Device Button Lights Contributors We’ve been lucky to work with some very talented artists willing to contribute their skills to making Lightning Bug better for all. Please check out their sites, show them your support! Photography by Maria “Jpeg” Izaurralde http://mariaizaurralde.com Sounds by State Azure https://www.facebook.com/StateAzure Permissions • Your Approximate Location, *Only used if you enable Lightning Bug’s local weather feature* • Phone state, Required so that audio can be ducked (partially to fully muted) during phone calls. • Read, modify, or delete SD storage contents. This is required to allow downloads and storage of sound and image files. • Run at startup. Lightning Bug runs very briefly when your device boots to synchronize alarms with your system clock. This has minimal impact on your device startup time. • Full network access & View network connections. This enables downloading extra content, such as sounds or images. • Send sticky broadcast. This creates stability in the primary audio and content download systems. • Prevent phone from sleeping. This ensures smooth audio playback. Your screen will still lock (go dark) to preserve battery life.
release_text: Version 2.9.8.1 - Fix for sounds and icons disappearing! * If your sounds and icons are currently not working, please reinstall them. * This fix will keep them from disappearing again, but can't automatically bring them back! Version 2.9.8.0 - Long-press Support to attach a log *Lightning Bug Audio* An audio system we built that fixes audio gaps\skipping! To enable: - Press the screen to bring up the main menu - Press the clock icon - Press the first option

description: Get access to a computer's desktop and use your favourite programs from distance. You can control mouse, keyboard (with functional keys and keyboard shortcuts), multimedia, presentation or power system commands. DOWNLOAD SERVER: http://www.androidremotepc.com/downloads/ Tutorial, support and general information you'll get here: http://www.androidremotepc.com/ Requirements: • Java SE - JRE (32-bit, x86 platform): http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html How to connect: 1. Download the server to your computer from http://www.androidremotepc.com 2. Turn on Bluetooth, turn on Wi-Fi or join the network cable to the PC 3. Extract downloaded file and launch Remote PC Server.jar (*.exe) 4. Run the application in your mobile. Choose a connection −> select the computer from pairing list or type your PC's detected IP address and confirm −> wait for connection • Detailed tutorials: http://www.androidremotepc.com/tutorial/ . Support: http://www.androidremotepc.com/support/ support@androidremotepc.com Features: • Remote Desktop • Mouse • Keyboard • Functional keys and keyboard shortcuts • Multimedia control (Clementine, iTunes, KMPlayer, PowerDVD 11, QuickTime Player, RealPlayer, Rhythmbox, VLC Media Player, Winamp, Windows Media Player) • Presentation control (MS PowerPoint, OO Impress, Adobe Reader) with stopwatch • Power system control This application controls multimedia players in contrast Bluetooth Remote PC (its free variation) even from BACKGROUND = window needn't to be focused! Support the following operating systems: • Windows 7 & 8 (x86, x64) • Windows Vista (x86, x64) • Windows XP • Linux • Mac OS X Thank you for using my application and please write your comments and opinions on improvements.
release_text: * WMP, Winamp, iTunes, KMPlayer, Rhythmbox and Clementine can be controlled from BACKGROUND * Added Presentation Custom Interface * Added Mini-Keyboard to Mouse and Desktop Service * Presentation control by Volume Buttons * Enhanced Remote Desktop Service * Repair Power Buttons for Linux * Repair Keyboard for Linux and Mac OS X * Faster and stable communication with the server * Edited tutorials * Repaired all known and reported bugs

description: Financial Calculator is a one stop shop application with a large collection of Finance related functionality that helps you to assess and gain control of your financial needs and assists you in planning for your financial goals. The key focus of this application is to facilitate the application user to customize the appearance, colors and user interface according to their favourite mode. The look and feel of the application is fully customizable throughout every single options present within it and the application is tailored to work on a wide range of android devices from small display phones to large tablet devices smoothly. Financial Calculator is also localized to major world languages. The application has the following features : 1. Time Value of Money Calculator The difference in value between money today and money in the future. Time Value of money can be used to compare investment alternatives and to solve problems involving loans, mortgages, leases, savings, and annuities. 2. Loan Amortization Calculator A method for repaying a loan in equal instalments. Part of each payment goes toward interest and any remainder is used to reduce the principal. As the balance of the loan is gradually reduced, a progressively larger portion of each payment goes toward reducing principal. 3. Compound Interest / Simple Interest Calculator Calculates the interest that accrues on the initial principal and the accumulated interest of a principal deposit, loan or debt. 4. Currency Converter Calculates the Currency Exchange rate of 93 world currencies in real time with the most updated exchange rates. 5. Retirement Calculator retirement calculator is used to calculate the amount of money left at the time of retirement based on a rough scale of parameters provided. 6. Internal Rate of Return Calculator Calculates the discount rate at which the net present value of costs (negative cash flows)of the investment equals the net present value of the benefits (positive cash flows) of the investment. It is an indicator of the efficiency, quality, or yield of an investment. 7. Net Present Value Calculator Calculates difference between the present value of cash inflows and the present value of cash outflows. 8. Stock return calculator stock return calculator is used to calculate the profit / loss , return on investment rates based on the months and purchasing and selling shares and its fee. 9. Return On Investment Calculator Return on investment (ROI) is the concept of an investment of some resource yielding a benefit to the investor. A high ROI means the investment gains compare favourably to investment cost. As a performance measure, ROI is used to evaluate the efficiency of an investment or to compare the efficiency of a number of different investments 10. Tips calculator Tip calculator calculates tip quickly and easily and helps to split the bill between any number of people. Round up or round down on any value on the tip calculator and see changes to the tip percentage, tip amount, total amount and amount payable per person immediately! 11. Discount/Increment and Tax calculator Discount calculator is used calculate the discounted value with the tax parameter. It helps us to know the discounted amount that in turn helps us to know the profit of the transaction 12. Percentage and Date Calculator percentage calculator is used for calculating the returns in the percentage, percentage change and percentage of values. Date calculator helps to find out the difference between any 2 dates and also number of days between 2 dates it can also be used to calculate the age of a person accurately Note : We shall be constantly working and updating this application in near future with much more features related to finance which suits the needs of every users and we are looking forward for your continuous support in return.

description: BringGo China is a premium turn-by-turn navigation app for your smartphone. It is full of useful navigation features such as Text-To-Speech voice guidance, Lane Guidance, Signpost Display, Speed Limits, millions of onboard POIs and much more. Maps are stored on the smartphone for offline use. ______________ COMPATIBLE DEVICES The BringGo app has not been tested with all Android devices. In order to use BringGo with your infotainment unit, please check the compatibility list before making a purchase. The list of compatible devices is available on www.bringgo.com ______________ COMPATIBLE VEHICLES  See www.bringgo.com for a complete list of compatible vehicles.  ______________ PREMIUM NAVIGATION FEATURES • Turn-by-turn voice directions • Find Places: millions of onboard POIs plus Internet Search means you’ll always find what you’re looking for • Lane Guidance to show you the correct lane to be in • Realistic Signpost Display • Map data from © NavInfo® & NAV2 onboard • Text-To-Speech voice guidance (speaks street names) • Auto re-routing • Multiple routing options; recommended, shorter distance, ECO • Search by Crossroad, Point on Map, postal code and more • POI Search: search by Category, POI name, Poi in City, partial word or phone number • Save and edit favorites • Recent destinations • Auto zooming (at intersection & on speed) • Route Planning: create and save route itineraries • Fuel cost calculator • Route summary for trip information • Speed Limit warning: adjustable audio/visual warning • Portrait and landscape mode • Current Location information(Street, Address) • Languages: US English, Chinese. ______________ MAP COVERAGE (BringGo China)  China.  ______________ IN-APP PURCHASES  1. Premium Navigation ($9.99 around 60RMB) 1 year license of the navigation app and access to software updates. *Please refer to the IN APP PURCHASES section to view prices in local currency.  ______________ GPS USAGE Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. ______________ * If you cannot hear the navigation guidance prompts from BringGo, or the volume of the navigation guidance prompts is too low, please see ‘Troubleshooting’ on www.bringgo.com

Have no plan to support App2SD until Android supports widget in App2SD. OnePunch Notes Pro is a commercial version of OnePunch Notes, and it has so many new and powerful features. Features only in Pro version - Calendar - Anniversary management - Lock folder - Camera/photo/paint/voice record/music file attachment - Contacts/map attachment - Todo list that you can manage todo, shopping list - Note widget that you can stick photo, paint, voice record, music, Todo list - All notes list widget - Calendar(Monthly/Weekly) widget - D-day widget - Quick note widget - Support free TTF fonts You can buy it by searching OnePunch Notes in Android Market and Amazon Appstore.

description: Рыбы России — самый полный атлас - полевой определитель рыб России для рыболовов — любителей. В энциклопедии рыб представлены 160 основных видов рыб - объектов любительского рыболовства. Для каждой рыбы приводятся: оригинальная цветная иллюстрация, черно-белая гравюра, описание признаков, мест обитания и биологии вида, местные названия. Прямо из энциклопедии рыб можно посмотреть календарь клева для данного вида рыбы — если было установлено приложение Календарь клева MP-Fish (отдельное приложение). Атлас связан с облачным он-лайн сервисом www.mp-fish.com, где можно посмотреть фотографии этого вида в уловах любителей рыбалки по всему миру. Russian fish - the most complete atlas - a field guide for anglers fish Russia - lovers. The encyclopedia presents 160 main fish species - the objects of recreational fishing. In compiling the materials used scientific papers. For each fish are: the original color illustration, black and white engraving, description of symptoms, habitat and biology of the species, local names. Directly from the encyclopedia of fish do fish calendar for this type of fish - if you have installed the application calendar Fisherman MP-Fish (a separate application). Atlas is associated with cloud-line service www.mp-fish.com, where you can see photos of this species in the catches fishing enthusiasts around the world.

description: KupiMe.hr, vodeći regionalni portal za grupnu kupovinu, od sada je dostupan i putem Android aplikacije! KupiMe.hr svakog dana nudi ekskluzivne ponude proizvoda i usluga uz popuste do čak 90%. Wellness, spa i fitness centri, saloni ljepote, putovanje, kulturni i sportski događaji, kino, koncerti, tečajevi jezika, edukacija i dr. su među uslugama na koje korisnici KupiMe ostvaruju visoke popuste putem kupona. KupiMe.hr Vam svakodnevno donosi povoljne ponude u gradovima: Zagreb, Split, Rijeku, Osijek i Zadar. Po principu grupne kupovine ponude se ostvaruju kad se dovoljno korisnika odluči za kupnju kupona. Od sada možete brzo i jednostavno pretraživati naše ponude te jednim klikom ostvariti kupnju Vama najbolje ponude. Ponudu možete koristiti odmah i to bez printanja kupona! Ukoliko ste registrirani korisnik KupiMe portala, u aplikaciju se prijavljujete korištenjem svojeg postoječeg korisničkog imena i lozinke. Ukoliko još niste registrirani možete to učiniti putem ove aplikacije s Vašeg Android uređaja. Živi bolje, plaćaj manje! Copyright (c) 2012 KupiMe d.o.o. Sva prava pridržana.

description: InTouch App is a simple, smart and FREE application for automatic contact backup, sync, and transfer. Stay in touch with those that matter - your contacts’ information will stay updated automatically so you never have to worry about your contacts again. Easily manage contacts across all your devices without losing any information or worrying about duplicate contacts. TRULY CROSS PLATFORM: Works across most devices including iPhone, iPad, Blackberry, Blackberry 10, Java phones, and all Android devices (Samsung, HTC, Nexus, LG, Sony, etc.). CONTACTS BACKUP & SYNC: Easily backup contacts to the cloud and sync contacts across all your devices. Edit information on one device, and see the changes on the others automatically. TRANSFER CONTACTS TO NEW PHONE: Easily sync contacts to your new phone by simply installing IntouchApp - hassle free - No PC / USB / Mac / Wires / Desktop Software, etc., required. Works across device formats with no loss of data. AUTO-UPDATING CONTACTS: Access the latest contact information. If any of your contacts changes their information, it will be automatically updated in your phonebook. When you update your information, it is updated for all your contacts as well! MANAGE CONTACTS ONLINE FROM MAC / PC: View and manage your phone contacts online at http://intouchapp.com from the comfort of the larger keyboard. MERGE DUPLICATES: Say goodbye to duplicate contacts. We manage and merge duplicates automatically for you. MEET & CONNECT: Easily exchange contact info with people you meet by typing in their IntouchID, using the integrated QR code scanner, or by simply giving a missed call. DIGITAL BIZ CARD: Go green with a virtual and professional business card, that can be easily shared with people you meet. SAFE, SECURE & PRIVATE: Contacts are your most important data on the phone. Their safety, privacy and security is our highest priority. Watch the video below to learn how the IntouchApp magic works. Learn about benefits of IntouchApp: http://intouchapp.com We, at Intouch, are committed to keep you in touch with the people that matter to you by ensuring you have each other's latest contact information accessible all the time. We promise to give you lots of exciting value-add features very soon! Do Stay In-Touch! Help us in spreading the word. Join us on Twitter: @intouchapp Facebook: https://facebook.com/intouchapp
release_text: New in version 2.0.5: - Fix invisible login button on Android 5.1 - New and improved interface - Separate contact list view for easier contact management - Multi select : tap and hold to select multiple contacts and delete in one go - Easily send a contact in human readable text to anyone via SMS, email, WhatsApp, Telegram, etc. - Improved display of search results - Bug fix: frequent sync on some devices - Bug fix: adding photo crashing on some devices - Many other bug fixes

description: The app that helps you drink water properly. Calculate how much you need to drink each day and receive reminders . If you do not know how much you need to drink each day , no problem! Our app has a super water calculator to help you. Just enter your weight and Drink Water tells how much you should drink per day. You do not need to worry about remembering to drink water, just set the time you wake up, the time you go to bed and our app does the rest . It will send you notifications during the day to remind you the right time to drink. Download now and check it out . - Calculate how much water you should drink per day based on your weight ; - Schedule notifications according to the time you wake up and sleep ; - Choose the interval between notifications ; - Track your historical consumption during the month ; - Simple, beautiful and intuitive. Download now and see! Another success of Aplicativos Legais www.aplicativoslegais.com

description: We like to think Plurk as a social network for weirdos - the cool, uncompromising and loving community we all long to have. Some of the largest communities for cosplayers, knitters, anime lovers, gay and etc found their voice on Plurk. And for that we are proud. We want to build Plurk not only a great community, but also a new kind of social destination that approaches human connection differently. Our users value privacy more than users of other social networks. You don't necessarily have to use real names, reveal your gender, location, or even age to the public. We talk funny. We are easily amused and at times, easily offended. With the first-ever newly released official mobile app, Plurk aims to bring a new kind of conversation and interaction to the social network world. It's not perfect. But please do try to install and use it with anyone you know. Enjoy a pleasant and great conversation experience in the social world without worrying leaking out your privacy. Stay tuned, more to come!
release_text: Bug fixes: Fixed unread bug. Fixed load more button bug. Fixed last response bug. Fixed friend's timeline bug.

description: *** 1 Million+ Downloads *** Zombie Shooter is a thrilling, action-packed First Person Shooter (FPS) 3D arcade game for your android with a towering ranking of over a million downloads! It is indubitably one of the favorites of zombie shooters as it gives you the ultimate power to kill animated dead bodies who are sent to assail you. As a first person shooter you can use the gun app to choose and wield an array of devastating weapons like the M1911 gun, MP5 gun, AK47 gun, Mossberg 50 gun and a sniper rifle. The sharp loud noises of gun shots followed by blood squirting out of your target, all help in simulating a real life encounter in this 3D arcade game. You have just enough time to load your gun and stop the infected zombies from spreading their deadly virus. It is your mission to rescue the human race and wipe out these undead creatures. The more the shooter kills, the higher he will move in the Leaderboard as a zombie killer or head hunter. Be warned! With all types of bloodied and grotesque zombies having invaded your territory, some monstrous and stout and some scrawny and gaunt; you - the zombie shooter with only a loaded iGun for self-defense, has to be on guard all the time! The zombies with mottled flesh wait for you in ambush in real-life modern spaces and alight at the metro station. Do not be fooled by the plodding and crawling of monster zombies as with no prior warning they will come stomping and sprinting towards you. Fight your way through the hostile environment and aim for the head of your opponents to upgrade and choose from lethal firearms with the money earned. You ought to be the best shooter to survive and become a first class contracted zombie killer. Download this free full version of Zombie Shooter today if you love action and adventure! Killer Features: ★3D Zombie shooting game ★Experience the unlimited thrill of killing a zombie via simulation ★Set against modern spaces like the Metro Station for a realistic game play ★Kill and kill some more zombies to hold the prestigious titles of Head Hunter and Zombie Killer on the Leaderboard. ★The gunapp lets you choose from the most sophisticated weapons – the M1911 gun, MP5 gun, AK47 gun, Mossberg 50 gun and a sniper rifle. ★Earn Cash and unlock weapons ★More than 10 types of unprecedented evil zombies. Pick up your heavy weapon to break them into pieces! ★We have walking zombies, running zombies which increase the thrill of playing the Zombie Shooter in a 3D environment. ★Take part in an intense zombie-blasting action shooter gameplay inside an arcade! ★Optimized Interface for a touch-based device ★Aspire to become a first class zombie killer ★Download free full version game and enjoy unlimited play!

description: Mélange-Mots est un jeu de mots. L’objectif est de créer des mots à partir de 7 lettres qui vous sont données. Vous avez 3 minutes pour compléter cet tâche. Si vous avez épuisé vos options, cliquez le bouton ‘J’Abandonne’ et le tableau de jeu s’ouvrerait. Les mots que vous avez manqué seront marqués on rouge. Si vous ne connaissez pas le mot, cliquez le pour voir la définition. Ce jeu est aussi bien pur ceux essayant d’apprendre l’Anglais. Si vous aimez les jeux comme Scrabble, nous pensons que vous aimerez notre jeu. En devinant un mot de 3 lettres, vous obtenez 3 points et 10 secondes de plus. 4 lettres donne 4 points et 15 seconds. 5 lettres donne 5 points et 20 secondes. 6 lettres donne 6 points et 25 secondes. Si vous devinez tous les mots, vous obtenez 100 points additionnels. Nous espérons que vous vous amuserez avec notre jeu. Mix-Words is a word game. The goal is to create words from 7 letters you are given. You have 3 minutes to complete this task. If you have exhausted your options, click the button 'I Surrender' and the table game ouvrerait. The words that you missed will be marked on red. If you do not know the word, click it to see the definition. This game is pure as well those trying to learn English. If you like games like Scrabble, we think you will love our game Guessing a 3 letter word, you get 3 points and 10 seconds. 4 letters gives 4 points and 15 seconds. 5 letters gives 5 points and 20 seconds. 6 letters given 6 points and 25 seconds. If you guess all the words, you get an additional 100 points. We hope you have fun with our game

description: The app Food Intolerances is a tool to help everyone who has to stick to a restricted diet because of food intolerances or irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). Typical applications are: histamine intolerance, mastocytosis, fructose malabsorption, sorbitol intolerance, aspirin intolerance, gluten sensitivity, or lactose intolerance. It contains about 700 foods that are commented and rated in view of the following subjects: ✔ Carbohydrate malabsorptions • Fructose malabsorption • Fructose/glucose ratio • Content of sugar (sucrose) • Sorbitol and other sugar alcohols • Lactose intolerance • Problematic fibers (i.e. fructans, galactans) • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Histamine intolerance / Mastocytosis • Histamine content of foods • Biogenic amines (e.g. tyramine) • Histamine liberators and DAO inhibitors • Problematic drugs • Food additives • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Aspirin/Salicylate intolerance • Salicylate content • Problematic food additives • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Other intolerances and allergies • Indication whether a food contains gluten* • Comments and rating for gluten intolerance* ✔ More features • Direct link to Wikipedia articles for all products • Uncheck unnecessary infos * This app doesn’t rate the products of individual manufactures but products and products categories. It offers you all the information you need to deal with your intolerance and avoid common mistakes. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ The app does not replace medical care and should not be used for diagnostic purposes. While the information provided here has been compiled to the best knowledge of the author, mistakes happen, since it is a complex matter, which depends closely on the individual person. We are constantly working to improve the app, but information may be wrong and may even contain harmful recommendations. The Baliza GmbH disclaims any liability as a developer of this app for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the information and any resulting damages, consequential damages and other disadvantages. The assertion of claims of any kind is excluded.
release_text: Improvements in version 2.1: Thank you so much for the countless suggestions and the constructive feedback! In terms of content we updated salicylate intolerance with the latest research. • display errors of lactose intolerance have been fixed • new products have been added • language support for Dutch, French and Spanish

app_name: 和風伝奇ビジュアルノベル「Wish」
description: 『Wish -tale of the sixteenth night of lunar month- 』は サークルMIGIHAがお送りする和風伝奇ビジュアルノベルです。 ■インストールする前に ・物語の第一章を収録した無料体験版を公開しておりますので ご利用の端末での動作確認をお願いします。 ・アプリの初回起動時にゲームデータをサーバーからダウンロードします。 ゲームデータのダウンロードと解凍には時間が掛かりますので Wi-Fi環境でのダウンロードをお勧めします。 ■作品について プレイ時間：20時間程度 推奨年齢：15歳以上（暴力、血液等の表現あり）　非18禁 ノベルエンジン：NScripter（高橋直樹様） android用エミュレーター：ONScripter on Android（Studio O.G.A.様） 制作：MIGIHA ■ストーリー ―――符術――― 己が体に流れる霊力を行使し、式を発現する太古の法 黒乃家は古来から符術を生業とし、その法を代々継承してきた家系だった。 天火は自らに疑問を向ける。 自分は何故、そのような黒乃家に養子として育てられたのか……、と なぜなら、彼は万物が持ちうる筈の霊力を僅かにも具えていなかったから。 術師として生きる姉や学園の先輩と共に過ごしながら、 知識として霊力と符術の存在を知るに過ぎなかった。 黒乃家が管理する神社に御神体として祭られている二振りの刀 刀身が血のように紅く、見るものを魅了する美しい刃 彼は確たる自分を追い求めながらも、この刀のようになりたいと思っていた。 気高く、誇り高く、そして大切な何かを護れるようなそんな剣に…… そして、いつまでも続くと思われていた日常は音を立てて崩れ始める。 自分の名を呼ぶ誰かの声 夢の中のもう一人の自分 殺意にまみれた獣の咆哮 その日を境に彼は別の世界へと足を踏み入れてしまうことになった。 符術という存在に分け隔てられていた、別の世界に…… ■諸注意 ・パソコン向けの仕様によりタッチ操作がしづらい部分がありますので 画面右側に表示される補助ボタンをご活用ください。 ・サブメニューボタンを押して出てくる『オートモード』は使用できません。 ■ホームページ http://www.migiha.net/ "Wish-tale of the sixteenth night of lunar month-" The It is a legendary Japanese visual novel that circle MIGIHA brings you. ■ Before you install - Since I have published a free trial version which recorded the first chapter of the story Thank you check the operation of the terminal you are using. · I downloaded from the server the game data to the first time you start the application. Time it takes to download and decompress the game data I recommend to download with Wi-Fi. ■ About Movies Playing time: 20 hours Recommended age: (with representation violence, blood, etc.) 15 years of age or 18 non-prohibited Novell engine: NScripter (Naoki Takahashi like) android emulator for: ONScripter on Android (Studio OGA like) Production: MIGIHA ■ Story --- Marks surgery --- law of ancient exercised spiritual power that flows in his own body, to express the formula Black 乃家 to the livelihood marks surgery from ancient times, it was the family, which has been inherited from generation to generation the law. Oven to direct the question to himself. Why, he would ..., Did you raised as to adoptive black 乃家 such Because he had not comprise even slightly spiritual power of all things should may have. While spending along with the senior school and sister to live as art teacher, It was only to know the existence of the marks surgery and spiritual power as knowledge. sword of the second swing, which is enshrined as object of worship at the shrine of black 乃家 managed Blade is crimson as blood, and beautiful blade attract what you see He thought that while pursuing a definite myself, and want to be like this sword. The ...... for such a sword like Mamoreru something important noble, and proud And, everyday, which has been thought to be continued forever begins to crumble and make a noise. Voice of someone calling my name Alter ego in the dream Roar of the beast covered in murderous He was supposed to be would set foot into another world on the border that day. The ...... it has been prejudice to the existence of marks surgery, to another world ■ Attention - There is a part that is hard to touch operation by the specifications of the PCs Please use the auxiliary button that is displayed on the right side of the screen. • You can not use come out by pressing the sub menu button "auto mode". ■ Homepage http://www.migiha.net/

description: DroidZebra is advanced Reversi program based on Zebra Othello Engine written by Gunnar Andersson. Features: - difficulty levels from beginner (practice mode) to world-class play - opening book with more than 500,000 positions - ability to force specific opening - practice mode Reversi is a strategy board game for two players, played on an 8×8 uncheckered board. There are sixty-four identical game pieces called disks (often spelled "discs"), which are light on one side and dark on the other. Players take turns placing disks on the board with their assigned color facing up. During a play, any disks of the opponent's color that are in a straight line and bounded by the disk just placed and another disk of the current player's color are turned over to the current player's color. The object of the game is to have the majority of disks turned to display your color when the last playable empty square is filled. Developer site on google-code: https://github.com/alkom/droidzebra/
release_text: Version 1.5.2 - added French translation - corrected status view text truncation issues - fixed crash on some devices Developer site on google-code: http://code.google.com/p/droidzebra/

description: Join Express RCS is an advanced VoIP client dedicated to VoIP Service Providers. The dialer works over Wi-Fi, 3G or EDGE and supports high quality audio and video calling. **IMPORTANT** The application is locked and requires an OPCODE from a service provider to be used. **Demo Opcode: 14022241 ** Join Express RCS pass-trough mechanism allows clients to make VoIP calls even from countries in which VoIP services are blocked. Main features: * Making and receiving VoIP calls * Enhanced Address Book on device showing RCS users * Multimedia files transfer (video, audio notes, pictures) * Geolocation sharing * Instant messaging (chats) * Support for HD audio and video codecs * Support for PUSH notifications Note for VoIP service providers: If you are interested in rapid roll-out of mobile VoIP services and acquiring an OpCode, please contact us on: hosted@voipswitch.com

description: In this game there will be a number of cards listed in the shape of three peaks while the cards in the bottom row are opened. Your job is to move away all the cards from the three peaks. You can only move a card that is adjacent (A and K are also considered to be adjacent) to the top card in the waste pile (the opened pile at the bottom). As cards are moved away from the peaks, cards that are no longer blocked by other cards can be opened. When no cards can be moved, you can open a card in the tableau (the covered cards at the bottom) and put it on the waste pile. When all the cards in the tableau are used and no more cards can be moved, then you lose the game. ★ Move the cards to each peak in this unique solitaire game. ★ Auto scaled and optimized to the screen size of your device. ★ Great for phones and tablets. ★ Built using Adobe AIR for best performance. ★ No hidden fees. Play for free.

description: At the age of 17 I was involved in a car crash as a passenger...After that crash I was suffering from a post-traumatic stress disorder. Daily panic attacks where normal since that point. I was consulting several doctors and prescribed different medications to ease the symptoms. As long as I was not in a stressing situation, everything was fine. But in certain situations, the panic attacks came bock with its full power. In these situations it is important to have tips and tricks how to avoid and ease panic attacks. Sharing my experiences and providing an app to help peolpe suffering from panic attacks led to the idea of Panic Free. This app is created for people who suffer from panic attacks from time to time, as well as people who suffer from constant panick attacks. For sure, if you suffer from heavy panick attacks it is always important to consult a doctor. This app will provide you with useful articles, videos, experiences and links in the web, to give you fast tips, how to cope with panick attacks. You have all this in one free app, plus a game, which challenges your coordination and mind to ease symptoms of accute panic attacks.

description: Edit GoPro and Action Cam Videos INSTANTLY on your phone. Pop your microSD into your phone (or use a card reader like these: http://goo.gl/orh16r ). Then you can Cut, Trim, Combine, create slow motion sequences and publish to YouTube whilst you are still up in the slopes! All this for FREE! All Editing is done on your device. No Cloud Required. Zero Quality Loss. You don't even have to copy your videos to your phone if connected over USB. Make sure you watch this 2min tutorial before you start! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lw_cIPB7uf8 THIS IS FREE? You can do almost all of the basic features you will need for FREE. You will need to purchase (in-app) to unlock all other features like Slow Motion, Zoom and Crop and additional Transitions, Overlays and Filters. WHAT COMES FREE ** Create videos automatically with one Free Style (the "ActionStudio" Style) ** Make manual edits with just one Transition, Filter and Overlay. Unlock loads more with the in-app purchase ** Share the love of muvee at the end of each video (this will be removed with the paid version) WITH THE PRO VERSION (IN-APP SINGLE UNLOCK) *** Crop each video clip and reframe your shots like a Pro *** Make Slow Motion sequences instantly using our Compressed Domain Technology *** Get the FAST MODE to make highlight reels in FULL HD *** Get ALL the Transitions, Filters and Overlays (over 30 of them!) *** Get our two most popular Styles: "Classic" and "Pump It Up" HIGHLIGHTS Action Studio has 3 Full Modes of Video Editing to help you quickly get from action shots to awesome YouTube stardom. 1) Auto-Mode: (tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OzwfzRqTI1Q ) This uses our patented automatic video editing technology. Just choose a Style and hit the Play button. Its really that easy. Each Style comes with its own hand picked music track but you can also use your own. Action Studio will use all the video on the timeline and automatically apply the Style's repertoire of effects and transitions. 2) Fast Mode: (tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MzLryIzuOzI ) This is the quickest way to simply trim and combine your clips together as well as add music You can even make slow motion sequences in some clips. In this mode, Action Studio uses compressed domain techniques to produce your video, which means they are never transcoded, hence it's wicked fast with zero quality loss. 3) Pro Mode: (tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dKlYC9-jDyU ) This gives you the full timeline and all the controls to add transitions, filters and overlays. Add Captions, Titles and Credits to complete your story. You can crop your videos to reframe your shots, you can even add slow motion sequences and tune the audio-music balance of each clip. In the Paid version, the muvee end credits will be removed. NOTE: This is a mini Final Cut Pro in your pocket. We have made this powerful app super easy to use. So if you run into any problems, please email support. If you like it, then please tell everyone about it! We need your help to keep improving this app and enabling more in the GoPro community to be making awesome videos whilst on the road sans Cloud.

description: Leave the rat race behind and reap the joys of life on your very own farm in Pocket Harvest! Cultivate crops with love, ranging from crisp lettuce to succulent strawberries, and refine them into prizewinning produce to bring orders from the local grocers flooding in. Adorable animal friends will lend a helping hoof too, providing milk, wool, eggs, and more! Feeling more ambitious? Boost your income and your image through tourism! From hot air balloons to sports facilities, you can build attractions in countless combinations to draw in high-spending city slickers. In Pocket Harvest, you wear the overalls, so you call the shots! Grow your farm from the ground up into a flourishing cornucopia of fun! -- Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kaipa.jp . Be sure to check out the wildly popular Game Dev Story for your mobile device or PC as well as our collection of FREE games!

description: ✰✰✰ MIAMI STREET: HEAT BASKETBALL GAME ✰✰✰ Take on the heat challenge! This is not your typical basketball game! Pull back and release your jump shot "Angry Birds" style, Pick up power-ups and avoid obstacles to battle through 30 objective-based levels. Play on the famous streets of Miami in the heat of the sun or the breeze of the summer night. Updates coming soon will incorporate leader board, achievements, and versus mode to compete against friends through Google Play Games! ✰ REAL BASKETBALL PHYSICS ✰ [+] True physics engine built-in to replicate authentic bounces and shots [+] Be careful, your players has lots of power, so don't flick too hard! [+] On some levels, basketballs are free, so don't hold back! Throw as many as you can to beat the clock! [+] Pick up the balls if you need more! ✰ AMAZING POWER-UPS ✰ [+] Glass Tunnel - Get 10 seconds of glass goodness, gently rolling your shot into the hoop. [+] Big Basket - Doubles the size of the hoop! Capitalize on these! [+] Funnel - Make sure your arch is on; the funnel will collect your high shots and deposit them into the net. [+] Ghotchamayne - What?? You'll have to find out for yourself. [+] Many more! Thats right! Slam dunk it like Lebron James or Shaq. Take a fade away three like Michael Jordan. YOU can be the Miami Heat hero!

description: *****THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP***** FEATURES > Notifications for SMS/GMail/Calls > Time/Date > Wi-Fi/Mobile Data indicators¹ > Weather/Temperature > Battery percentage/Charging indicator¹ > Upcoming Calendar Events > Dark/Light themes ¹ = Change dynamically depending on whether or not they're being used REQUIREMENTS: Zooper Pro-> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWidgetPro Any File Explorer App such as ES-> http://tinyurl.com/FileES ***NO TASKER REQUIRED**** Setup: 1 Install Zooper Pro 2 Install Zooper Wear 3 Create a 4X4 Zooper Widget 4 Within the Zooper Widget setup, select any of the templates That's it! Return to your Homescreen & Zooper Wear should now be present Choosing a Template > If your phone has an SD display (example: lower than 1080p such as 720p) , select one with "SD" in it's name > If your phone has an HD display (example: 1080p & higher) , select one with "HD" in it's name > Some phones don't fit it full-screen - to fix this, within the Zooper skin, increase the "Scale" by 1 or 2 > On some phones it will look square-ish - to fix this, within the Zooper skin, decrease the "Scale" by 1 or 2 Available Widgets: - All have all the same Features listed above - All have Light & Dark Themes - All have App icons that only appear when they have Notifications For more in-depth setup steps -> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWear-Original-Setup More in-depth video-> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wAB_xS2LraU Reminders - App has no App icon itself - If you can't get it working, EMail me & I'll be happy to help WARNINGS - This Widget is made for use on phones, not tablets. - If you're ROOT'ed and/or using a custom ROM, changing the DPI of your device can cause problems with Zooper Widgets ===== ===== ===== ===== QUESTIONS - Can I assign a different App to launch when tapping SMS/Phone? - Can I use it on my Android Wear™ device? Answers to those & more FAQ's : http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWear-Original-FAQ Q: Can I track more than just SMS, GMail & Phone? A: Yes, though you'll need Tasker Pro & a different version of "Zooper Wear" Tasker Pro-> https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.dinglisch.android.taskerm Zooper Wear-> http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lanhoj.zwskin.zooperwear
