description: Telenor Space usluga je cloud backup rešenje koje Vam omogućava da na jednostavan i siguran način čuvate svoje poslovne (a po želji i privatne) podatke na udaljenom serveru, u žargonskoj terminologiji – u oblaku (Cloud). Sve vrste dokumenata koje odaberete za sinhronizaciju biće automatski smešteni na cloud server korišćenjem odgovarajućih aplikacija na vašim uređajima. Podaci su uvek dostupni putem bilo kog uređaja koji je povezan na internet. Možete arhivirati podatke sa svojih uređaja pri čemu će se oni nalaziti samo na serveru. Možete deliti pojedinačna dokumenta sa bilo kime, ili deliti kompletne direktorijume sa vašim kolegama koji takođe koriste uslugu. Možete sinhronizovati Telenor Space direktorijum sa više vaših računara, koji ukoliko su povezani na internet, uvek će imati poslednju verziju dokumenta kopiranu i na disk računara. Da biste koristili uslugu potreban vam je korisnički nalog. Usluga je dostupna biznis korisnicima Telenora. Više o aktivaciji usluge i kreiranju korisničkog naloga, kao i uputstva za korišćenje aplikacija na različitim platformama možete pronaći na www.telenor.rs Ključne prednosti usluge: • Prostranost – Usluga omogućava 20GB prostora na serveru za čuvanje podataka. • Pristupačnost – Usluga je besplatno dostupna korisnicima kao sastavni deo paketa Moja Firma M, Moja Firma L, Moja Firma XL, Moja Firma XXL, Moja Firma Premium. Uz aktivnu uslugu na raspolaganju je i dodatnih 20GB internet saobraćaja koji se može koristiti isključivo za saobraćaj ostvaren ka serverima na kojima se čuvaju podaci. I mnogim drugim paketima (spisak paketa pogledajte dole) Telenor Space usluga je besplatna u promotivnom periodu (do kraja Oktobra) sa istom količinom od 20GB prostora na serveru ali bez dodatnog internet saobraćaja (usluga može potrošiti značajnu količinu internet saobraćaja pogotovo prilikom prvog sinhronizovanja uređaja pa uz pakete koji nemaju uključen internet saobraćaj u okviru paketa preporučujemo aktivaciju nekog internet dodatka). Nakon promotivnog perioda usluga će se naplaćivati na mesečnom nivou po ceni od 295 dinara (sa uračunatim PDVom). • Multi-device rešenje – Podaci su dostupni kako kroz web aplikaciju, tako i kroz aplikacije za razne uređaje i operativne sisteme. Trenutno su podržani Android i iOS mobilni uređaji (Windows Phone će uskoro biti takođe podržan), kao i Windows i MacOS operativni sistemi za laptop i desktop računare. • Sigurnost – Sva razmena podataka vrši se putem HTTPS protokola sa visokim nivoom enkripcije podataka (256 bit AES enkripcijom). Serveri su locirani u Norveškoj koja spada u zemlje sa najstrožijim zakonima o privatnosti podataka, pa su podaci potpuno sigurni od mogućnosti neovlašćenog čitanja. Uz to data centar u kome se nalaze serveri spada u najbolje na svetu a i ima sertifikat da se napaja potpuno obnovljivim izvorima energije. • Brzina – Na nezavisnim testiranjima rešenje koje se koristi za Telenor Space uslugu se pokazalo kao duplo brže od usluge koju pruža Google Drive i tri puta brže od Dropbox usluge. • Lokalna podrška – Kreirali smo za vas detaljno uputstvo za korišćenje Telenor Space usluge. Pored toga konstantno ćemo unapređivati selekciju često postavljanih pitanja i odgovora, a za svako pitanje na koje niste mogli da nađete odgovor na ovim stranicama na raspolaganju vam je naša korisnička podrška. Telenor Space Services is a cloud backup solution that allows you a simple and secure way to keep your business (and, if desired, and private) data on a remote server, the žargonskoj terminology - in the cloud (Cloud). All kinds of documents you select for synchronization will automatically be placed on the cloud server using the appropriate application on your device. The data are always available via any device connected to the internet. You can archive data from their devices while they will be placed only on the server. You can share individual documents with anyone, or share complete folders with your colleagues who also use the service. You can sync Telenor Space directory with more of your computer, which, if connected to the internet, it will always have the latest version of the document and copied to the hard disc. To use the service, you need a user account. The service is available to business customers of Telenor. More about the service activation and creation of user accounts, as well as instructions for the use of applications on different platforms can be found at www.telenor.rs Key benefits of the services: • spaciousness - Service provides 20GB of space on the server for data storage. • Accessibility - is a free service available to customers as part of a package My Company M, L My company, my company XL, XXL My company, my company Premium. With the active service is available and additional 20GB of Internet traffic, which can be used only for traffic generated to the servers on which the data is stored. And many other packages (the list of packages, see below) Telenor Space service is free during the promotional period (until the end of October) with the same amount of 20GB of space on the server without additional internet traffic (the service can consume a significant amount of Internet traffic, especially during the first synchronization device and with packages that have included internet traffic within the package, we recommend activating an internet allowance). After the promotional period, the service will be charged on a monthly basis at a price of 295 dinars (inclusive of VAT included). • Multi-device solution - data is available to the web application, and the application of a variety of devices and operating systems. Currently supported Android and iOS mobile devices (Windows Phone will soon be supported), as well as Windows and MacOS operating systems for laptops and desktop computers. • Security - All data exchange is carried out through HTTPS protocol with a high level of data encryption (AES 256 bit encryption). Servers are located in Norway, which is one of the countries with the strictest laws on data privacy, and data are completely safe from the possibility of unauthorized reading. In addition to the data center where the servers are among the best in the world and is certified to be powered entirely by renewable energy sources. • Speed ​​- The independent testing solution used for Telenor Space service has proven to be twice as fast as the service provided by Google Drive and three times faster than the Dropbox service. • Local support - We have created for you a detailed user manual Telenor Space Services. In addition, we constantly improve the selection of frequently asked questions and answers for every question that you could not find the answer on this site available to you, our customer support.

description: Shufflette is a free artist's tool for making improvised silhouettes from randomly selected shapes to be used as a starting point for design/illustration. QUICK START GUIDE: http://youtu.be/TUYIF7W2_uY Pinch-zoom and Pinch rotate. Multi-select: Press and hold on the Smudge (upper left hand corner) Tap objects while holding on the Smudge to toggle their selection, or, swipe over multiple objects to spread the selection/deselection. Tap the Smudge to deselect. Selected objects are moved/rotated as a group. Recommended for tablets. Press BACK to reshuffle parts. Use android's built-in screenshot button to take screenshots. (you have to enable it yourself in settings - long-press on appswitch) No ads or nag screens or nothin'. Maybe later I'll make a simple in-app-purchase for a totally optional $1 donation. We'll see how this thing does first, though. Reviews appreciated. 1.0.17: Massive update - Shape tabs (smudge sideways, tear off tab) - EZ Move Mode (smudge down, release over EZ button to toggle) - Duplicate objects (double-tap smudge while moving objects) - Delete objects (move/carry objects, hold smudge to activate clutch, then drag objects to the X, release them and then tap the X once more.) - Movable Smudge (drag it into any corner) - Select All objects (double-tap Smudge) - Auto-shuffle when last object is deleted - BACK saves state and exits app.
release_text: (PENDING UPDATE UNTIL GOOGLE GETS THEIR AAPT-DUMP-BADGING ISSUE FIXED, UGH!!!!!) 1.0.22: - Rotational Snap + 4px Grid Snap (tap EZ button during object drag to toggle) - Symmetry (pull last tab to toggle) 1.0.18: - EZ Mode Scaling is constrained (See end of description for 1.0.17 update since it won't fit here)

description: A wonderful game for toddlers and kids with a stunning collection of vehicles! your kid loves vehicle games, puzzles and want to play with cars and motors ? He loves trucks and tractors ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover each type of vehicle, will recognize the sounds and in the meanwhile will exercise his memory! Vehicles and cars for toddlers is an educational and entertaining game. Easy to learn and to control: -drag and drop the vehicles on the screen, play with toy cars, have fun and match the couples! -interact with all the elements on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy, medium and hard, to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler fine motor skills. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory. Match up all vehicles pairs and honk the horn ! Features: - high quality game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 with very cute vehicles - Easy to use and control - fun for children of all ages, designed for preschool boys and girls - Simple for toddlers and babies with different levels of difficulty - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills by dragging and dropping the cars - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - more than 130 vehicles in the FULL version - randomly generated match games! this educational game will never get old! This is the FREE version (Ads supported), If your kid likes this app, then you can buy the FULL version with more match games, more vehicles and no ads https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.match.carsFull The best games for kids from romeLab !

KEY FEATURES: ● Stunning 3D-graphics with amazing effects truly best in their genre; ● Tower defense gameplay with collectible card game elements; ● Over 26 towers with up to 25 levels of upgrades and 13 kinds of spells; ● Share your progress via Facebook and make your friends jealous. DON'T FORGET ABOUT: ● 36 types of violent monsters; ● Mighty bosses with unique abilities; ● Captivating storyline with 23 missions, extra boss levels, and randomly generated missions; ● Special placement on the map and anomalies to boost your powerful attacks; ● Different strategy for every map; ● Unpredictable ways of defense. EXCLUSIVE NVIDIA TEGRA 4 FEATURES: ● Improved spell particle effects; ● Glow/Bloom post effect; ● Soft character shadows; ● Exclusive on start in game bonus for Tegra 3 & 4 users; ● Support of 1080p video mode. And even more amazing features! Try it right now and claim the Prime. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PrimeWorldDefenders

description: FOR A LIMITED TIME YOU CAN REMOVE ADS 30% OFF! Never arrive late to the bus stop again using Sudbury Transit. Always get the right time and never have to stand in the cold again. To use the real-time information tool, enter a street name, a 4-digit stop code , or key word and click search. Be advised that this app is using information from the City of Greater Sudbury Transit site: http://mybus.greatersudbury.ca/api . If you cannot find a result the site might be down. I created this app just so it would be easier to access the bus times and also to give me some experience in android programming. FEATURES: ★ Bus leaving downtown. ★ Bus Schedules for the week and the weekend. ★ Look up time for the bus to come at your stop. ★ Save your favorite stops. ★ With maps you can locate all the bus stops available around you. ★ Also see all the bus stops numbers. FAQ Q: When I open the map it does not go to my location right away. What is it not working? A: The issue is that you have to disable your GPS and only allow location via Wi-Fi & mobile network location. Q: I just completed the InAppPurchase to remove the ads and I still see the ads. Why is that? A: If you still see the ads after the purchase, you might have to completely close the app and reopen it.
release_text: * Now using the new API created by the City http://mybus.greatersudbury.ca/api Vesrsion 2

description: This is a plugin for the CAR LOCATOR app. It will not function by itself. YOU MUST FIRST INSTALL CAR LOCATOR. The Evernote Plugin will integrate Car Locator with your Evernote account. With this plugin, you'll be able to do the following: - Automatically send and sync your locations to Evernote. - Send/sync your location notes and photos to Evernote. - Search and import your geo-tagged Evernote locations into Car Locator so you can navigate to them using Car Locator. - Tag your locations with your Evernote tags. - See your locations anywhere you have access to Evernote, whether it be on the web, your phone, or tablet. With the powers of Car Locator and Evernote combined, you'll never get lost again!

description: Bombcats explodes onto Android! Help Fuzzball and friends rescue the Bombkittens across a massive world with nearly 200 levels. From Radiangames, creators of the award-winning Slydris, Super Crossfire, Inferno+ comes Bombcats! Seven cute and volatile felines ready to explode into action to save their imprisoned Bombkittens. Master your Bombcat jumping skills in 194 levels and many exciting modes: * Kitten Rescue - Save the kittens trapped in the magic bubble cages and collect all 3 Suns. * Time Trail - Race through 5 quick sub-levels to save the kittens as quick as possible. * Marathon - You've got some extra jumps and a longer fuse, now use them to go as far as you can. * Challenges - A new cat and layout in an old level. You've got limited attempts, so make each one count. There are seven Bombcats at your disposal, and each one has their own special skill! From the wall-clinging Clawdia, to bounce-happy Boing, to the ground-shaking Crush, you'll learn to love them all! Along your quest, you'll gain access to new boosts, powers, upgrades, and even a few fancy costumes to make your explosive adventures even more enjoyable. Like all Radiangames' titles, Bombcats SE works great on all tablet sizes as well as phones!

description: KFSN-TV Fresno. Wake up with the ABC30 Fresno Alarm Clock app! Start your day with local news and sports headlines, Doppler Radar, current weather conditions and traffic. Set your alarm to wake up to the sound of your favorite ABC30 personality, such as Jason Oliveira, Margot Kim, Graciela Moreno, Warren Armstrong, Angelo Stalis and Kevin Musso. You can choose one of our classic alarm tones or even choose a song from your music library! ★ ALARM CLOCK FEATURES ★ - Choose from 5 custom ABC30 Fresno tones: AM Live with Margot Kim & Jason Oliveira, Graciela Moreno, Warren Armstrong, Angelo Stalis and Kevin Musso - Choose to wake up to your favorite song using your own music from your music library - Wake up to 1 of 10 built-in classic tones: Alarm Clock, Ascend, Chimes, Descend, Dog Barking, Doorbell, Sonar, Waterfall, Whistle, and an authentic Rooster crow - Choose from 3 different Fresno-area images for your alarm app wallpaper - Choose 12- or 24-hour clock - Multiple alarms supported - Snooze/Stop alarm - Sound volume adjustable - Snooze time customizable - Turn vibrate ON/OFF - Repeat alarms on certain days of the week - Alarm works even when the screen is locked or when phone is muted ★ NEWS ★ - Get the latest news and sports headlines from ABC30 Fresno right when you wake up ★ WEATHER ★ - View animated Doppler Radar maps - Get hourly and extended weather conditions - Automatically set weather to your current location or manually add a location by zip code - Watch the latest ABC30 Fresno video forecast ★ TRAFFIC ★ - Get the latest Fresno traffic information to plan your commute using our real-time traffic maps

description: Back in 1990s inclusion of Solitaire (Klondike) and Minesweeper in Windows has resulted in billions of hours of lost productivity over the years. Starting with Windows 98 other version of solitaire joined the suit - FreeCell, Spider, Tri-Peaks and Pyramid. As a part of the standard Windows installation those games have been popularized around the world. For each of those games millions of clones have been created on all possible platforms. So why should you give our version a try? We combined all six games (Klondike, Spider, FreeCell, Tri-Peaks and two flavors of Pyramid) in a tiny download package. The fun of original games is preserved but some improvement are made to make it easier to play on the small factor devices. In particular, you don't have to drag individual cards - drag&drop whole column, only proper cards will move the rest will snap back. The scoring all the games is simplified to track only number of moves to solve the puzzle. If you stuck, feel free to use hints or undo - implemented by all the games. Use menu (top-tight corner) to change the game type, difficulty, check score, help or to start a new game. Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...
release_text: - Fixed screen sizing problem for Android 4.4 - Fixed card selection in Pyramid Solitaire - Added Pyramid Solitaire - More levels for Tri-Peaks. - Added Tri-Peaks solitaire - Added single click in Klondike to move cards to the proper spot.

description: Escape From Windows is a endless escape. After each window you must find another window to continue escape and also after each window your score increases. Your goal is to get high score. The game is ending when the sphere touches the wall. It is like the flappy game in real 3D. You can move sphere up, down, left and right (click Help button to see demonstration). - for move up you must tap on the sections of the screen which are lower than the sphere. - for move down you must tap on the sections of the screen which are upper than the sphere. - for move left you must tap on the sections of the screen which are on the right side of the sphere. - for move right you must tap on the sections of the screen which are on the left side of the sphere. The game have RELAX MODE which you can activate in game settings, in that mode difficulty is not changing. In game settings you can change: - RELAX MODE (On/Off) - SOUND (On/Off) - MUSIC (On/Off) - ORIENTATION (Landscape/Portrait) - FRAMES PER SECOND (Show/Hide) - VIDEO QUALITY (Normal/High/Ultra), you can play with video quality to get optimal quality, for some devices Ultra quality is not the best it depends on GPU.
release_text: null

description: With "Horse World 3D: My Riding Horse" you're immersed in the world of the equestrian center. Your own horse to groom and ride - anytime you want! You'll learn valuable things about caring for a horse, take lessons in the riding ring and master diverse tasks. You'll become a horse aficionado in our riding game and have tons of fun playing with your favorite animal. Features • Learn lots worth knowing about caring for a horse • Your own horse - groom, pet, ride • Show your abilities and ride to beat the time • Collect horseshoes and use them to buy inventory for the tack room • Jump courses, ride into the countryside and even more courses • 3D Quality Expand your horse knowledge In the stall you'll learn a lot about grooming your horse. You can currycomb, brush and pet your horse. The hooves must be cleaned and the stall needs fresh straw. It's all possible by touching the touchscreen. Lessons in the riding ring After you've groomed your horse, you'll get a riding lesson. In the course you'll show your skill at riding, try to follow the riding line as closely as possible and thereby try to achieve the best time. Tack room In the game you'll receive horseshoes for your accomplishments. You need the horseshoes to buy inventory such as bridles, saddles or horse rugs. Even more playing fun on the jump course and when riding into the countryside Want even more playing fun? In the jump course you jump over the obstacles. Your Android device will turn into a rein in which you can lead your horse through the motions with your device. Even a ride through nature is possible. Ride through the country or by the sea and always without directional limitations. The name HorseWorld is used under licence from HorseWorld http://www.horseworld.org.uk/
release_text: We wish all of our HorseWorld fans a Happy New Year! As Christmas is now over, we're redecorating again. Stay in the saddle, as there's a year full of exciting equine adventures ahead of you!

description: The unrivalled leader in global keyboards! You don't need to look at the keyboard and screen separately to type a word. ●Supports 25 multilingual keyboards! -English, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, Iranian, Urdu, Hindi, Hebrew, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Thai, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Hungarian, Italian, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Greek, Russian, Ukrainian, Turkish ●Use the input trace function to find a typo easily! -See which keys you have pressed, so you can find and correct typos quickly. ●Edit text more conveniently using multi-toolbar! - You can edit more conveniently with the multi-toolbar's various functions. ● Supports one-hand mode! - You can type conveniently using one hand with one-hand mode. ● Artificial Intelligence (AI) dictionary available! When you write the first letter or the first word, a list of previously used words or sentences appears so that you can choose one from the list. ●A total of over 30 high-quality skins are available! - Mint, Stylish black, iPhone style, Yellow star, Simple black, Brown, Dark gray, Blue gray, Baby pink, Lovely pink, Purple, Navy, Violet, Pink candy, Blue candy, Pallets, Cow pattern, Pink lady, Emerald beach, Scarlett fabric, Clockwork, Marshmallows, Simple gray, Blue, etc. Enjoy using TS keyboard, supporting easier and more intuitive multilingual input and a variety of secondary tools (multi-toolbar). ★Key Features * Supports 25 multilingual keyboards * Input key tracking effect * Multi-toolbar - Drag toolbar: Move a word or a cursor back and forth or easily delete a word. - Dictionary toolbar: Enter text in Korean or English more conveniently. - Quick edit shortcut: Press the button on the left of the toolbar. A keyboard appears so that you can move cursor and edit the text. *One hand-mode *AutoText input *Artificial Intelligence (AI) auto input *Skin selection: You can select a colorful skin (Mint, Stylish black, iPhone style, Yellow star, Simple black, Brown, Dark gray, Blue gray, Baby pink, Lovely pink, Purple, Navy, Violet, Pink candy, Blue candy, Pallets, Cow pattern, Pink lady, Emerald beach, Scarlett fabric, Clockwork, Marshmallows, Simple gray, Blue, etc.) *Skin customization: You can set your picture as a keyboard background. *Key reading: You can listen to a native speaker's pronunciation of the alphabet when pressing the relevant key. *Voice recognition: You can enter text using your voice. *Key height adjustment: You can adjust the height of the keys to suit you. *Problem report: Have you experienced difficulties in reporting problems or asking for help? Now you can easily report any problems or ask for help via e-mail from Settings. ★ Supported Input Methods for Countries *Korea - 17-key keyboard - Chunjiin keyboard - EZ Hangul keyboard - Short vowel keyboard - Chinese character conversion and character table conversion (How to input Chinese character: [大] → Enter ""대"" and press the 한자 key. Select a Chinese character from the candidate list.) * Japan - 12-key input method - Roman alphabet input method *China - Pinyin input method - Suangpin input method ★How to Install - Settings -> Language & keyboard -> TS Keyboard -> (for Gingerbread 2.3 or earlier versions) Touch and hold notepad or input field, (Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0 or later version) Pull the top bar down when the keyboard is displayed -> Select Input Method -> Select TS Keyboard

description: Battle of Vikings is a multiplayer strategy game. Your goal is to build strong Viking Village in the North. Build your own army, train Vikings, Berserkers, Air Bombers and even Dragons. Clash with many other players all over the world. Win and grab recourses by cracking their defenses. Use resources to control and optimize the economy of your land and increase prosperity of its habitats. Start your own adventure, use different tactics to win fights and compete for the top-list of Nordic commanders. • Build and develop your Nordic Village. • Hire an army of vikings to raid other lands. • Use different tactics to win epic battles. • Battle with players all over the world. • Free to play strategy game.

description: Surf for your life across the galaxy! An inevitable destructive force is after you... The end of the universe! Your only hope? You can cheat death by rewinding time! Get ready for the most adrenaline-pumping surf of the year! PRESS "Time Surfer is blazing fast" -- Indie Games "Time Surfer is a glorious mess of bright colors, pixel art and the most upbeat of chiptunes." -- TouchArcade (4.5 stars) "…leaving you with a wide, faraway grin on your space battered face." -- PocketGamer (8/10) "The Time Surfer soundtrack is more than just a single piece of music—it's a journey." -- Kotaku "The most promising runner I’ve seen in a long while." -- IGN "From the old school visuals to the thrilling gameplay, you need this title in your life." -- GameTrailers.com "A great example of how a fun idea can be iterated upon." -- 148 Apps (4 stars) SIMPLE CONTROLS, NO COMPROMISE Two touch gameplay keeps everything easy to reach and easy to play. Touch with your right thumb to dive. Touch with your left thumb to rewind time. It couldn’t be simpler. EVERYTHING ENDS, AGAIN AND AGAIN Dodge spikes, pits and the end of the universe - it’s a typical, never-ending day in the life of a trans-dimensional cosmic time god! Pick up speed, magnet and time bonuses! Miss one? Rewind and grab it! RANK UP, PET OUT Complete missions to unlock new pets and earn Space Cakes to feed them. Little dudes like Axolotl, Squid Scholar or Robo-Duck will join your surf and give you crazy new abilities! GORGEOUS VISUALS Transition through beautiful high-resolution landscapes. Immerse yourself in a starry night as you surf, bounce and fly through various zones with different hazards and scenery! BACK IN THE GOOD OLD 80’S Psychedelic visuals backed up by numerous references to 80’s icons, including a police box, a time-travelling car and the monkey king on a cloud. UP THE ANTE Surf through “Hell Zone” and turn the difficulty up to 11 with a spike-infested gauntlet or try the Kepler Run, a surreal flight through a galaxy swamped with black holes. For those who really love a challenge. A HAUNTING SOUNDTRACK A spacey, hand-crafted chip-tune soundtrack reflects on Time Surfer’s inevitable doom yet eternal existence. Living forever is both a blessing and a curse. == About Us == We also made Bean’s Quest! An award-winning platformer for mobile devices. Check it out if you are looking for a classic platformer with elegant controls! Say hello@kumobius.com we’d love to hear from you! Find us on Facebook: facebook.com/TimeSurferGame Follow us on Twitter: @kumobius

description: Brazilian Word Search Game! The popular classical word game is now in Brazilian Portuguese! Find the hidden words on a 10x10 board and solve the puzzle. Challenge your brain with this puzzle app and improve your brain power! Features: - Online leaderboard - Compete with your friends - Almost infinite number of random puzzles - Supports tablets and all screen sizes Achieve the highest scores and compete with your friends and also other Word Search Puzzle fans! There are 12 words hidden horizontally, vertically or diagonally on a 10X10 puzzle. Your aim is to find these words as quickly as possible. Score is calculated based on the length of the found words and the elapsed time. When you find all the words in the puzzle, the score is sent to the online scoreboard on Google+. You can see the best players daily, weekly or for all times. If you do not prefer to sign in with Google+, you can still play the game in offline mode but your score is not submitted to online scoreboard in this case. Have fun everyone!

description: FastTimes: CTA does just what the name says. It's the fastest CTA bus tracker and train tracker for Android. - Uses LIVE CTA Bus and Train data to give you instant arrival times. - Add bus and train stops as favorites for quick access during your commute! - Enter a stop number to see when a bus is coming! - Full map view so you can see all the buses and stops nearby. After using other CTA bus and train tracker apps, I decided to make a better app and make it FREE! Uses the CTA Bus Tracker and CTA Train Tracker APIs to deliver up-to-the minute information. Interested in testing new versions before they're released? Send an email to fasttimesapp@gmail.com and I'll add you to the Google+ Beta community! description: The first mobile app-based portfolio hub featuring fine art & design talents from around the world. Browse through a virtual art space to navigate across artist portfolios, gallery pages & dealer profiles. Access event details & browse through art work in a breeze. Whether searching for an artist or designer for a job or simply looking out for creations by great artistic talents, you can interact swiftly through the app in High Definition (HD) experience & make direct contact with the artists. The application has received its pre-launch submissions from established artists worldwide such as Rosihan Dahim (Singapore), Heri Dono (Indonesia), Qi Hong (China), Chng Seok Tin (Singapore), Bikash Poddar (India), Thomas Kimmerlin (France), Lee Kyoung Hoon (Korea), Giuseppe Pravato – Beppi (Italy), Ben Puah (Singapore) Chen Yun Xiao (China), Eddy Coethyl (Indonesia), Tan Haur (Singapore), Majid Sheikhakbari (Iran) and Grace Huang (Australia) since its open call. ARTISTS Apply for your page in our app-based art & design platform. It has an interactive virtual gallery featuring artists from around the globe - ready for swift browsing on mobile devices. Please contact us to be featured in the app as an artist. GALLERIES Art spaces such as art galleries & museums are a dedicated highlight to Arts Portal readers - where galleries can establish a base for artists & exhibitions of their own throughout the year. Strategically build your audience & art space profile through a new media platform that reaches to the hands of all around the world. Please contact us to be featured in the app as a gallery. ​ ​ DEALERS The Arts Portal is one of the few in the arts scene that knows the importance of who is behind the greatest artistic landscape that makes the society of art grow & evolve. Be it an art collector, critique writer, material specialist or an exhibitions organizer. Dealing with art? Contact us to know more about being featured as a dealer. ART LOVERS Love art and design? Immerse yourself with the imaginations of the best contemporary art. View photography to surreal art, creations from realistic masters to pop artists in HD experience. Connect directly with artists without hassle.

description: Bored of typical racing games? Try this super awesome NFS (Need For Stunt) game. This game has no rules, just reach the finish line by running upon all the weird ramps you can imagine. Each level has different types of road tracks and ramps which will pump enough adrenaline in your bloodstream to make you feel excited as well as frustrating because of game difficulty. Enjoy the PC/Console level advance graphics features such as HDR(High Dynamic Rendering), Real-time shadows, Motion Blur and more in your high-end mobile devices. Want some wacky crude fun? So what are you waiting for? Download it now!! [ === ADVANCE GRAPHICS FEATURES===] ★ Real-time Shadows ★ HDR (High Dynamic Rendering) Effect ★ Motion Blur Effect ★ Sun-Shaft (God Rays) Effect ★ Antialiasing filtering [ ===GAME FEATURES===] ★ Reach 3D Graphics Environment ★ Camera cinematic motion ★ Weird levels you have never seen before ★ Difficult levels that make you feel like crying ★ Unlimited Car Nitro More updates coming soon! Please don't forget to rate the game and give your suggestion (if any). On giving less than 4 star, please write the reason, so that we can improve the game accordingly.

description: Stair Dismount™ is a 3D ragdoll simulation game featuring the indestructible Mr. Dismount & friends. Push Mr. Dismount down the stairs for maximum damage! Experience somersaults and barrel rolls in convincingly accurate 3D physics simulation! Use photos of your friends to decorate Mr. Dismount and share your acts of loving kindness via email, Facebook and other social circles! Dismounting is not to be attempted at home or outside, and should be left to trained professionals. Secret Exit does not recommend or condone dismount attempts outside 3D computer simulations. description: This is the free version of Patient IBS, to remove adverts upgrade to the full version of Patient IBS also on the play store. IBS data is transferable between the two versions. Use this app as a personal logbook for your Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) and view charts of your symptoms over time. You can also learn more about the condition and how to manage it with information written by doctors. Developed in association with the IBS network, the UK's charity for irritable bowel syndrome. The symptom tracker will help you record your bowel movements and the type and severity of symptoms that you get each day. It will also allow you to record notes on food and lifestyle. This may help identify triggers such as food, alcohol, or emotional stresses, and may show if exercise helps to ease or prevent symptoms. If you are advised to try a particular treatment, log your bowel movements and the type and severity of symptoms that you get each day for a week or so. You can then assess whether treatment has improved symptoms or not. You can also share your results with your GP. The app features: * Log your bowel movements - following each bowel movement, rate the form of your stool and other related factors such as straining, urgency and pain * Log your symptoms - record information regarding a variety of symptoms, such as your overall wellbeing, stress, bloating, nausea, anxiety and lethargy * Log your diet and activities - record your level of activity, fluid intake and food diary as well as any general notes * View graphs of your data - view a historical chart of your stool type, symptoms and activity. You can view results over the period of one day, one week, or one month. You can filter the graphs to just show specific symptoms, eg bloating and abdominal pain * View a historical log of all entries * Share the entries by emailing the results to an address of your choice * View up-to-date information on Irritable Bowel Syndrome written by GP's for patients (requires internet connection) * Search Patient.co.uk from within the app for more trusted health information (requires internet connection) The IBS symptom tracker should help you develop a better sense of understanding over your symptoms, and assist communicating with your GP about how you are doing. Patient.co.uk - Trusted medical information and support
release_text: * Fixed signing issue on older devices

description: Um repositório com diversos mangás para ler online ou offline. A idéia é que possa baixar os mangás que você acompanha em casa e possa ler depois em qualquer lugar. Estamos sempre em fase de evolução. Sugerimos que o usuário utilize uma rede wi-fi para baixar os mangás, já que fica um pouco pesado para baixar com 3g. Os mangás que disponibilizamos, são da Central de Mangás. Caso possua algum mangá que deseja que seja removido, favor entrar em contato diretamente com a Central de Mangás, para que a política de propriedade intelectual seja mantida. Qualquer sugestão entra em contato! A repository with many manga to read online or offline. The idea is that you can download the accompanying manga you can read at home and then elsewhere. We are always evolving. We recommend that you use a wi-fi network to download manga, since it is a bit heavy to download with 3g. Manga we provide, are the Manga Central. If you have any manga you want it removed, please contact directly with Central Manga, so that intellectual property policy is maintained. Any suggestion contacts!

■本アプリは、内部ストレージ（スマートフォン本体）に15MB以上、外部ストレージ（microSD等）に1.3GB以上の空き容量が必要です。 ※機種によっては、内部ストレージに1.3GB以上の空き容量が必要となる場合があります ■アプリ購入完了後に約1GBのデータダウンロードが発生します。ダウンロードには数十分～数時間程度を要します（通信環境により大きく異なります）。 なお、3G回線およびLTE回線は、通信制限によりダウンロードが途中で行えなくなる恐れがございますので、Wi-Fi環境のご利用を強く推奨します。 ■海外におられる状態で「自動更新を許可する」にチェックを入れている場合、バージョンアップ等により意図せず高額の通信料が発生する恐れがあります。 海外に出掛けられる際は、Playストアにて「自動更新を許可する」のチェックを外されることを推奨します。 【よくあるご質問】 ・お問い合わせいただく前に、以下の内容をご確認ください。 また、お問い合わせの際は、必ず【アプリ名】【お使いの機種名】【お問い合わせ内容の詳細】を明記願います。 Q.外部ストレージの空き容量が充分あるのに、ダウンロードが出来ない A.お使いの機種によっては、内部ストレージ内に全アプリデータを保存する場合がございます。 内部ストレージの総容量が4GB以上ある機種については、一度内部ストレージのデータを外部ストレージに移動、または削除いただき、1.3GB以上の空き容量を確保した上で、再度ダウンロードをお試しください。 Q.エラーコード（例：498）が表示され、ダウンロードが出来ない A.ダウンロード時に表示される「Wi-Fi使用時にのみダウンロード」にチェックを入れた状態で、Wi-Fi以外の通信を行った場合に発生します。 一旦ダウンロードを中止し、別のWi-Fi回線への接続をお試しいただくか、チェックを外し、別の通信手段（3G回線等）からのダウンロードをお試しください。 Q.アプリを中断したい OSのアップデートに伴うトラブルについては弊社で一切責任を負いかねますので、実施につきましてはお客様ご自身の判断にてお願い致します。 Q.アプリの請求は毎月発生するか？ A.当スロットアプリは「買いきり」のため、ご請求が発生するのは、初回ご購入時のみとなります。 Q.対応機種一覧に載っていない機種は、いつ頃アプリに対応するか？ description: 개인적인 필요에 의해 만든 어플인데 혹시 도움되는 분이 있을까 싶어 공유합니다. 배터리와 날짜를 상태바에 표시할 수 있습니다. ======= ======= ======= 배터리 잔량을 보여주는 여러 위젯들이 있습니다. 저도 그런 위젯을 띄워 놓고 사용을 했는데요. 이 위젯들이 오히려 배터리를 소모하고 CPU를 쓰는 것 같더군요. 기분 탓일 수도 있겠지만, 그런 위젯들을 삭제하고 나니 배터리가 아주 조금은 덜 먹는 것 같기도 하구요. 그래서 생각해 낸 것이... 배터리 잔량을 숫자로 보고 싶긴 한데 위젯처럼 맨날 떠 있는 게 아니라 시계 보기 위해 화면을 켜는 것처럼... 화면이 꺼진 상태였다가 켜졌을 때 잠시 동안만 배터리 잔량을 보여주는 앱이 있으면 좋겠다 싶어 만든 게 바로 이 앱입니다. 이 앱은 화면이 켜지면 상태바에 배터리 잔량을 잠시 동안만 표시해 줍니다. Please note this app will only work if you are a Crunch client!

description: Dots & Waves is a live wallpaper made of colorful dots and beautifully animated waves. ★ FEATURES ▪ Fully customizable live wallpaper. ▪ Widget for easy access to wallpaper settings. ▪ Transparent settings screen, changes are instantly visible. ▪ Several different types of waves and dots movement. ▪ Adjustable animation speed of dots and waves. ▪ Custom dots, waves and background colors. ▪ Predefined best color compositions. ▪ Supports both portrait and landscape orientations. ▪ Supports all devices and all screen resolutions. ▪ Completely lag-free and battery friendly. When the wallpaper is not visible it turns itself off. ★ ADDITIONAL NOTES ▪ Your phone must support live wallpapers for this to work. ▪ To keep this wallpaper free of costs, we've decided to put unobtrusive ads in a preference screen. ▪ Please support us and rate 5 stars if you like this wallpaper. ★ PERMISSIONS Full Internet access: used for ads appearing occasionally on settings screen. ----- Visit our official site at http://chiralcode.com Give +1 on Google Plus at https://plus.google.com/108242467433118126426/ Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/chiralcode Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/chiralcode
release_text: 1.6. Minor bug fixes. 1.5. Removed ads. Fixed a bug with only one wave selected. Optimized memory usage. 1.4. Editor for dots, waves and background colors. New dots type. 1.3. Added new color set for background, dots and waves. New color themes. New wave types. 1.2. Completely redesigned waves and dots animation. New color themes. 1.1. Removed static background and added fluently animated waves with multiple color themes.

description: Reminders for every occasion! Call Reminder provides a fast and convenient way to schedule reminders for virtually any occasion. Great for professionals or anyone else needing a little more organization in their busy schedule. Call Reminders - Quick creation of callback reminder after each phone call - After-call window provides options for quickly creating a reminder, call note, or calendar event. - Reminder notes shown on call screen during calls with that specific contact - Create call reminder from call log - Option for automatic creation of call reminder for all calls or missed calls only - Auto-complete text box for selecting contact during reminder creation, just start typing and results are filtered based on what you type - Add repeating alerts to each reminder - Add reminder to device calendar - Choose different ringtone for each reminder Miscellaneous Reminders - General purpose reminders for any occasion (meetings, grocery, laundry, etc.) - Add repeating alerts to each reminder - Add reminder to device calendar - Choose different ringtone for each reminder SMS Reminders - Schedule SMS messages to be sent automatically - Add confirmation prompt at scheduled time of sending or choose to have SMS sent automatically without user intervention. - Schedule repeating SMS reminders Call Notes - Create call notes for any contact that will be displayed on call screen during all calls with that contact - Full customization of call note text, background, etc. Features - Option for persistent notifications that require user intervention before dismissing - Choose how long reminders remain in database after expiration - Option for 24-hour time format - Calendar Integration (Android 4.0+) - Multiple font options - New features coming!
release_text: Version 2.46 - Moved contacts query to separate thread - Added scroll for call notes - Added 5 and 10 second options for dismissing After-Call window - Bug fixes Version 2.45 - Fixed bug for adding call note only after phone calls - Fixed bug concerning notifications on Android 4.4 Version 2.44 - Added popup functions to call notes - Fixed bug concerning calendar start day on Monday

description: Add touchscreen support to An2An Remote, to redirect touch actions from one device to another device through Bluetooth or WiFi/Network. Support most touch actions likes multi-touch, swipe and pinch, provides screenshot as touch action reference, and work with receiver devices which have no physical touchscreen (e.g. Android TV, PC). This is not a standalone app and there is no separated icon after installed. Recommend to check compatibility with An2An Remote (Demo) before purchase. Please contact us for any problem ( android.locnet@gmail.com ). Requirements - An2An Remote (Demo) 3.0.0+ (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.locnet.an2an.demo) - Rooted Receiver device. Instructions 1. Install and setup An2An Remote 2. Install An2An Touch to Transmitter device, restart transmitter app if running. 3. Enable "Use Root Features" on Receiver device, and grant root permission. 4. Connect An2An Remote normally and start using.
release_text: null

description: Xperia Edition – NAVIGON by Garmin Important notes: - The software requires additional data (maps, voices) via WiFi after installation! - Xperia Edition runs EXCLUSIVELY on selected SONY Xperia devices - See also further notes at the end of this text Garmin brings its award winning experience from personal navigation devices to transform your SONY Xperia device into a fully functioning mobile navigation system. Xperia Edition is an on-board solution, meaning no data transfer, waiting time or roaming charges occur when using the map display, voice announcements or route calculation. The system files are saved directly to your device so you can navigate anywhere in Europe incl. Russia OR North America OR Australia OR Southern Africa OR Brazil/Argentina without worrying about cellular coverage or excessive data charges. You can make free use of the Xperia Edition with all options active within a 30 days trial phase and later decide whether you want to extend this phase by another 30 days via a Google subscription for the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN package or purchase one the two lifetime options EFFICIENCY or EXCELLENCE available. Even after ending of the trial phase the pedestrian navigation function always remains. Features included in the EFFICIENCY, EXCELLENCE and 30-DAYs-ALL-IN: • Europe, Russia OR North America OR Australia OR Southern Africa OR Brasil, Argentina maps onboard • Turn-by-turn voice guidance • Intelligent address search • Reality Scanner • Point of Interest search • Local Search (a) • Car & Pedestrian mode • Navigate to contacts • Take me home function with a single click • Route Planning • Clever Parking • Live Weather (a) Features additionally included in the EXCELLENCE lifetime package and the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN option: • Reality View Pro - Photo realistic display of motorway junctions and exits • 3D map view – Bird-view-like map display • Speed Assistant – Display of current speed limit and warning when exceeding • Radar Info - Fix installed speed & red light cameras • Lane Assistant Pro - Display of the best lane to take when approaching a junction • Text-to-Speech - Spoken Street Names • MyRoutes - Multiple route calculation • Enables pedestrian navigation on the SONY SmartWatch 2. Requires additional installation of the free extension NAVIGON Smartwatch Connect, available here in Google Play Optional extensions for the EXCELLENCE package, included in the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN option: • Traffic Live (a) - Real time traffic updates. Avoid traffic jams, roadworks, accidents, road closures and more. Automatic re-routing possible • Mobile Alert Live (a) - Receive real time information on danger spots in your country (Europe and North America only!). You can also report such spots to help other drivers • Mobile Alert Live Premium (a) - As Mobile Alert Live, but working Pan-European wide (Europe only!), providing information level of reliability, time passed since last report and the number of reporters travelling in your direction • FreshMaps - Get lifetime map updates (b) • Panorama View 3D - View the landscape in 3D with mountains and valleys • Urban Guidance - Use also public transport to navigate in many urban areas (a) • NAVIGON cockpit - Gauges and displays showing various physical parameters (a) Live service. A data connection is required (b) Garmin warrants at least a 24 month support for this service after purchase Notes: - On first startup a short data connection (ca. 25kB) is mandatory to register your product. Please ensure data connection is available. - NAVIGON is an on-board solution. It means that all map material, voices and system files are saved on the phone. The version - when all maps are installed - requires approx. 3.4GB of free memory. Please ensure you have sufficient mass-storage memory available. - The map material must be downloaded via WiFi. Please ensure a reliable connection is available. The download depends on the transmission speed and number of selected maps.
release_text: Version 5.4.2 : + bug fixes

description: Photo artist-Face changer is the funniest app who allows you to create or modify any of your pic with all new amazing effects,objects and styles. It is one of the unique kind of app which can decorate more than one face at a time. it has very natural and good looking objects which make the app even better. Photo art is very powerful tool and that's why it is very hard for anyone to believe that pic is not real. It allows you to rotate Funny Object clock wise or anti clockwise 360 degree. You can even have more control over adjustment setting,you can zoom-in,zoom-out,drag etc. You can add beards, new ultimate funny hairstyles, funny & crazy goggles and other cool accessories. Personalize your pictures by applying some hilarious stickers on them. Thanks to this amazing tool you will be able to create extremely funny pics. Use this fantastic sticker app to make your friends laugh. Select a photo from your gallery or camera and start personalizing by choosing among a lots of accessories. With this fantastic tool you will be able to create fake pictures and send it to friends and family via various sharing options e-mail, Whatsapp,facebook, Twitter, Skype, another Messenger Tool. Take a photo of a friend and decorate it with the stickers you will find in this big pack. It's very easy to use the tool: 1. Choose a picture from camera or gallery 2. Resize or crop your selected pic using advance resize tool 3. Choose the accessory according to your test 4. Adjust the object with your fingers(zoom,drag and rotate). 5. change or delete the object by double tap on that object 6. See the amazing results 7. Save and share your wonderful pics with the world Make your friend’s day better by bringing some humor into their life. Create delightful images of them with photo art

description: The "Category Quiz" is a quiz where the questions must be answered by category. The "playing field" looks a little bit on Jeopardy! Currently there are over 6,000 questions in German and English available! If there are any problems, crashes or questions please contact me via email ( categoryquiz@live.at ) or on Facebook! The questions are frequently updated! At the moment the questions are divided into the following categories: - Sports - Entertainment - Food - Geography - Science - History - Art & Literature - People - Music - Religion - Technology - Animals - Economy - Politics If all questions in a category are answered correctly you get 100 extra points. If the second category is completed, you get 200 extra points, for the 3rd Category 300 extra points, etc. If a question is answered incorrectly the category gets "locked" and no more questions can be answered in this category. If the question timer is used (can be enabled/disabled using the game options) the user has 30 seconds to answer the question. The faster the question is answered the more points you get (3 points for every remaining second). In addition the user has the possibility to get help using the 3 Jokers (50:50, stop timer, new question). If you decide to start a "quick game" 6 categories are chosen automatically. In a "normal game" you can choose your favorite 6 categories. ! IMPORTANT! You have the possibilty to enable/disable if the correct answer is shown in the case that you answer a question incorrectly in the "options". The available high score list shows the top 15 results. Example Questions: 1) Which famous brazilian model was a Victoria's Secret Angel from 2000 until mid 2007? a) Gisele Bündchen b) Alessandra Ambrosio c) Izabel Goulart d) Flavia De Oliveira 2) Who had a big hit with the song "Gangnam Style" which was recognized by Guinness World Records as the most "liked" video in YouTube history in September 2012? a) Psy b) 2Pac c) Jay-Z d) 50 Cent 3) Which NFL team represents the city of Pittsburgh? a) Steelers b) Patriots c) Giants d) Cowboys Tags: quiz questions answers Jeopardy category bonus millionaire empire intelligence test knowledge lucky nature Celebrity Soccer Tennis Basketball Biology Chemistry Cinema TV beer Pizzaland city state image fairy painter radio tree flower Islam Christian Church Dog Trivia
release_text: Changed: - Questions weren't displayed on some devices

description: Dr. Jack Hayford, founding pastor of The Church on the Way, has a team of anointed leaders to produce the New Spirit-Filled Life Bible. Even after more than twenty years, the Spirit-Filled Life Bible offers a fresh look at the Scriptures and the work of the Holy Spirit. This Bible addresses important issues of Spirit-filled living in the context of solid biblical scholarship. Find the Holy Spirit throughout the New Spirit-Filled Life Bible. Also the FASTEST Bible app and most efficient way to read & study the Bible. Quickly navigate to any verse and easily access tools to help further your understanding of the Bible. Over 5 million downloads on both iOS and Android, and over 400,000 people reading their Bibles each week! FEATURES: • Downloaded (offline) full text of the New King James Version • Kingdom Dynamic—41 themes throughout the Scripture that give us values as we advance the gospel throughout the world • Word Wealth—More than 550 key terms defined and brought to life pulling the language from the original Greek and Hebrew to everyday English • Truth-In-Action—Practical charts pulling out practical application from every book of the Bible • Detailed book introductions to each of the 66 books of the Bible • Verse-by-verse study notes • Articles from 50 of the most respected pastors, teachers, and leaders in the church today • Take Notes • Highlight or Underline words & entire verses • Bookmark Verses • Add Margin Notes • 4 types of Navigation (Scroll Wheel, 3-Tap, 2-Tap, & Keyboard) • Full Screen Immersive Mode by a simple double tap (Android KitKat and higher) • Folders to organize your notes & bookmarks • Access Study Bibles & read the study notes beside the Bible • Offline (No Internet connection required for downloaded Bibles) • Red Letter text for Jesus' words • Search the Old & New Testament to find verses containing the entered keyword • Night mode for low-lit reading areas • History folder to access past 50 viewed verses • Split-screen mode to read two Bible translations at once • Share verses & notes via Google+, Facebook, Twitter, email, & SMS • Bible talks to you! Text-to-Speech allows the Bible to be read to you out loud • Change font size and font type • Auto scroll allows the Bible to scroll automatically • Backup all your purchases and created Bible data using a FREE TecartaBible.com account • Cross References & Footnotes by long-pressing on dotted-underlined words & superscript letters IN-APP CONTENT: • Bibles (KJV, NIV, NLT, NKJV, ESV, GW, MSG, NCV, and more!) • Commentaries (Matthew Henry's Concise, Commentary Critical & Explanatory on the Whole Bible, John Wesley's Explanatory Notes, John Gill's Exposition on the Whole Bible, and more!) • Study Bibles (NIV Study Bible, NKJV Study Bible, NIV Woman's Study Bible, Lucado Life Lessons Bible, and more!) • Devotionals (One Year Devos) If you have suggestions, questions, or comments we would love to hear from you! Email us at androidsupport@tecarta.com If you need help or want to see all the features in your Tecarta Bible, please visit our Help website at http://tecartabible.com/help/
release_text: - Login with Facebook to backup your Notes, Highlights, Bookmarks and purchased content - FREE full-trial access to all Study Bibles! - Devotionals now behave like Study Bibles allowing you to read your Devotional alongside your favorite translation - Fixed NIV Quest Study Bible bug where the answers view was being cut-off - Fixed NIV Men's Devotional Bible sorting bug

description: This is Kanji Dictionary (漢字辞書), containing 6000 translation articles. The Dictionary is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database size is more than 1MB. It will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Main features: 1. History – every word you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add words to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Word spelling, using Text-To-Speech module (requires internet connection). Powered by iSpeech®. 6. Context word search – click any word in translation article and search for it’s translation. 7. Random word of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (dictionary database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.
release_text: Bugfixes. Interface localization to many languaes. Google +1 button. Fix for search field for left-to-right languages.

description: FinalStrike3D is a modern 3-D helicopter combat action game. In this game you will play the role of the best helicopter pilot for special tasks.You will have possibility to pilot different helicopters equipped with special weapons and devices. Your tasks are divided into different missions, and you must eliminate as many enemies as possible to get the highest score. Enjoy breathtaking graphics combined with special effects such as spectacular explosions and light mapping. FinalStrike3D uses your device's accelerometer and virtual pad to control the helicopter. Game features: - 2 campaigns and 15 missions full of action - 6 types of weapons including guns, missiles and bombs - over 30 types of different enemies - possibility to pilot 4 different helicopters - fully detailed true 3D graphics - accelerometer and virtual pad control mode - support SD card - support for multiple languages including: English, German, French and Polish ======================================================== In case of any problems or suggestions please contact to support@finalstrike3d.com
release_text: - OpenFeint integration - 2 new missions in the Desert campaign - several mission fixes and graphics improved - terrain textures quality improved - particle effects added - helicopter sound effects added - improved graphics performance

description: Help the pharaohs of ancient Egypt supervise the construction of pyramids before your glorious return to the home planet. Build a pyramid from ground up with single-digit number blocks. Erect scaffolds and apply arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) on the number blocks on lower tiers to create the number blocks on higher tiers. Upper-tier number blocks and scaffolds can only be built if a solid foundation has been laid on the lower tiers. A red number is the number a block at the particular location must carry in order to form a solid foundation. Game features: - Endlessly replayable. The challenge is different every time you play. - 8 challenging achievements to unlock. - 4 difficulty modes, from kid-friendly to Einstein-worthy. Number Pharaoh is the latest exciting educational game that horns your Maths skill in a fast-paced but unexpectedly hilarious way!

description: This iOS course is aimed to provide a through and clear understanding of the iOS programming. We start with basic Hello world for iOS and cover the most important topics which will provide you a firm base to build your iOS Apps. This lecture uses the latest IOS SDK and uses an example based approach to teaching. We have kept the learning curve simple and focus is on conceptual learning rather than just teaching how to use a particular API. After completing the course you will understand the principle behind the API patterns and why a particular control behaves the way it does. We will cover topics like: ✔ Objective C Concepts ✔ Controls and Templates in iOS ✔ Xcode interface ✔ Views and View Controllers ✔ Target Action and Controls in iOS ✔ Delegation ✔ Navigation Controllers ✔ Categories and Extensions *YOU ARE GOING TO GET FROM THIS COURSE* - Over 36 lectures and 6 hours of content! - To understand the basic concepts used in iOS Programming - To learn objective C features - To learn the use of views and view controllers - To get a tour of the design patterns used in iOS Programming *WHAT YOU WILL LEARN* • SECTION 1:Introduction to iOS Programming • SECTION 2:Templates, Views and Controls in iOS • SECTION 3:Target Action and Controls Coding • SECTION 4:Other Important Features • SECTION 5:Summary *FEATURES* ✔ Lifetime access to 36 lectures and 4 quizzes ✔ 5+ hours of high quality content ✔ A community of 7800+ students learning together! ✔ Watch courses on the go: video lectures, audio lectures, presentations, articles and anything inside your course. ✔ Watch courses in offline: Save courses for offline viewing so you can watch them while you're on a plane or subway! * WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT THIS COURSE* "For those who jumped into developing iOS starting with iOS 7 world be thinking this course is outdated. I'm telling you this course is still applicable as the instructor points out behind-the-scene things and how everything works. Very good, thank you so much!" - (Jakkrit Szz) ★★★★★ "I come from Java and Android world and this course is great to know the basics of iOS. Thanks!" - (Andrés Santibáñez) ★★★★★ "It covers all the basics right from Objective-C to iOS. All the topics that are touched are clear and detail. They have professional team of trainers for technologies ranging from Mobility, Web to Enterprise and Database and Server Administration. They have a team of industry professionals who have been training manpower for more than a decade. description: * Photo Fun Editor is a powerful photo editor which we created because we wanted a quick and easy way to edit our photos on the go with no fuss. * A very comprehensive photo editor and pretty much everything you could ever want to do on your phone! * There are so many effects, stickers and features to apply to your photos! Create Photo Effects like + Photo Negative effect + Gray scale image + Sketch effects + Mirror effects + Oil Paint Effect + Bend Effect + Stamp Effect + Blocks effect + Sun Burn effect as if your friends spent the day at Beach + Television Effect (Ever wonder how you look on TV? This is the effect for you) + Old times Photos (Ever wonder how you would in 1930's? This is for you) + Sepia Color effects + Engrave Effect + Snow Effect + Round Corner Photo effects (Making them suitable for Fun Photo Frames) + Photo Flip (Flip Photo's vertically and horizontally for more fun) We’ve included all the tools you need, in a super intuitive interface so you can get right to editing. Features: + One-tap auto enhance + Gorgeous photo effects and frames + Fun stickers + Color balance + Crop, rotate, and straighten your photo + Adjust brightness, contrast, color temperature, and saturation + Sharpen and blur + Color temperature ("Warmth") + Color Splash + Focus (Tilt Shift) + Draw and add text + Create your own memes + Cosmetic tools: fix redeye, remove blemishes and whiten teeth + High resolution output + Drag and drop to customize the toolset + Scroll through your recent photos in a cover photo-like view from the home screen + Long press on photos on the homescreen to see options (including deleting the photo from your device) With a key multi -platform sharing , you can easily share your photos to Sina microblogging , Wechat, QQ , Google, Instagram, Whatsapp, Twitter and Facebook, easily retain fond memories of life , so that more people find you and appreciate you . The "Photo Fun Editor" structure is very simple and clear : even a child can use it ! However, despite its simple structure, it is for your images to provide a certain quality and a wide range of photo effects . DISCLAIMER: * Any issue about photo and stickers is our priority and considerable, please contact, appropriate action will be taken. * The software uses the Aviary-SDK, would like further information , please visit the website : http://www.aviary.com/

This is a fun app that teaches state and capital recognition, the correct abbreviation for each state, state flags, famous Unites States destination, state flags and various facts about each state too. App Features: * Colorful map of the United States * Learn State names, capitols and abbreviations in a variety of formats * Clear graphic call outs and instructions on how to play and navigate through the cards * Total of 430 different flash card variations There are 9 sets of United States Flash Cards which are: 1. Identify States in U.S. Map 2. Identify Capitals by State 3. Identify States by Capitals 4. Identify States by Shape 5. Identify States by Abbreviation 6. Identify Abbreviation by State 7. State Flags 8. Famous Places in the U.S. 9. State Birds

description: Comprehensive phonics app with basic to advanced lessons for kids learning to read. Features * More than 1200 exercises using 15 different interactive games. Hundreds of words. * Phonics topics covered for Kindergarten to Second grade. * Brief instructions for each topic, followed by many interactive games with voice instructions, phonics cues, and hints to reinforce the concept. * Kids enjoy fun sound effects, interactive animations and rewards on completion. * No third-party ads and No data collection. Lessons start with consonant and vowel sounds for beginners learning to read. Later lessons cover advanced topics for older kids - Consonant Blends, Digraphs, Diphthongs, CVC/CVCe. Kids can do the lessons in order or skip ahead. The lessons cover the following topics in phonics - * Consonant Sounds * Short and Long vowel sounds * CVC & CVCe words such as tap & tape. * Consonant Blends such as bl, cr, sm, ld, mp etc. * Vowel Pairs * Hard and Soft Cs and Gs * The many sounds of Y * Silent letters * Syllables * Vowel sounds with R * Digraphs such as ch, sh, ph * Diphthongs such as oa, ea, oy Each lesson is taught using multiple games such as - * Locate the position of a phonics sound in the word * Phonics Bingo * Word arithmetic * Pop Bubbles * Connect starting letter to image * Memory game * Spell the word game * Word search game * Flip cards to correct the spelling * Break the word into Syllables * Fill-in the missing letters in the word using its phonetic sound * Select objects that make the given letter sounds * Multiple games for sorting and ordering of objects using phonics sounds. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.
release_text: Graphics Improved and Bugs Fixed.

description: Welcome to this easy to use HIIT & Tabata Workout Timer giving you the possibility to measure your training and achieve even better results. You can easily control the time of the rounds their count and the time you will be in a rest between workouts. The app can run while in the background you listen music on other player. The cool and simple design protects you from unwanted distraction and makes you focus on the exercises you are performing. This timer will count your round and give you straight signals on when to stop and when to start the next exercise. Its simplicity is making it perfect for every type of workout you practice. We know that what matters is your concentration and motivation which you can easily lose if you have to set your timer for too long. So with HIIT Workout Timer you are ready in three steps. -------------------------------------- What can you control on HIIT & Tabata Workout Timer? - Number of workout rounds; - Duration of a round; - Duration of a break; - You can pause the run; - You can easily reset the run and make a new one. -------------------------------------- It can help you in: - High Intensity Interval Training; - Tabata training; - Strength training; - Cardio training; - Circuit training; - And many more... -------------------------------------- Distraction free Workout Timer is compatible on every device playing Android 2.3 and up. It works fine even on your tablet. Take a look and love it. Make your workout an unique valuable experience. You can this app searching for: workout, fitness, training, hiit, tabata, timer, exercise, cardio

description: Hotspot Control is a tiny app that enables or disables Portable Hotspot functionality of Android. Usually you could just do this in Android settings, but on some devices this option is hidden, or only works if you have a SIM inserted. Hotspot Control does away with those requirements, assuming that the hotspot functionality itself is actually still present and operational on the device. Rooting is *usually* not required. THIS IS NOT DESIGNED TO BEAT YOUR CARRIER'S TETHERING PROTECTION, OR LET YOU TETHER FOR FREE - For some people it does (it depends on how that protection is implemented) but this is not what the app was made for. It's no use complaining that it doesn't do this for you. This app is designed to circumvent some issues when setting up a *local* hotspot so your devices can communicate with eachother, *not* with the internet (though that also works on several devices). You can configure the access point (hotspot) name and password, encryption used is alway WPA2 AES + TKIP, to keep it simple. On some devices that do not have a cellular data connection capability (like the Nexus 10) the hotspot will not give out IP addresses - the app will auto-detect this situation and fix it, but root is required for that option. Note that without root on these devices, the connected devices can still communicate if you configure their IP addresses manually, but that is something for the advanced user. I personally need this to create a private network (even without a SIM, and thus without an actual *internet* connection) in the field between a number of my devices. Some genius at Samsung decided that my Note II shouldn't create an access point if no SIM is present - I beg to differ! Maybe someone else has use for this as well. For discussion and questions, see the thread on XDA: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2230848
release_text: v1.1: - Added (automatically detected) feature to fix the issue with some devices that do not have cellular data capability (like the Nexus 10) that they do not give out IP addresses. Unfortunately this does require root to fix.

description: L’application Nez rouge, présentée par l’Opération Nez rouge et Desjardins, est l’outil parfait pour un retour à la maison en toute sécurité durant le temps des fêtes de fin d’année! PRINCIPALES FONCTIONS • APPEL : À l’aide de la géolocalisation de votre appareil, vous pourrez communiquer avec le centre de coordination de l’Opération Nez rouge le plus proche , connaître les heures d’ouverture ou l’alternative locale (taxi) pour un retour à la maison sécuritaire. • ALERTE : Vous prévoyez célébrer? Programmez une alerte qui vous rappellera d’appeler un ami, un taxi ou l’Opération Nez rouge. • ATTENTE : Obtenez une estimation du temps d’attente pour le service de raccompagnement dans dix grands centres : Laval, Montréal, Longueuil, Sherbrooke, Québec, Trois-Rivières, Drummondville, Rimouski, Outaouais, Saguenay. • PHOTO : Vous êtes fier d’avoir fait le choix d’être bénévole ou utilisateur? Affichez-le et partagez-le avec vos amis sur Facebook, Twitter ou par courriel. • CONCOURS : Inscrivez-vous pour participer au tirage et peut-être vivre l’expérience Desjardins au Festival d’été de Québec! Les membres Desjardins auront automatiquement une inscription supplémentaire au concours. Une connexion Internet est nécessaire pour mettre les données à jour, mais l’application fonctionne aussi sans connexion avec les données préalablement téléchargées. L’application est compatible avec tous les téléphones dotés d’une caméra et d’un GPS ayant la version Android 2.3.3, ou la version Android 4.0 ou ultérieure pour enregistrer un témoignage vidéo. L’application Nez rouge est fonctionnelle durant toute l’année, vous permettant d’utiliser la plupart des fonctions en dehors des dates de fonctionnement du service. Toutefois, veuillez noter que les onglets Appel et Attente ne seront actualisés que pendant la période de l’Opération Nez rouge, soit à compter du premier vendredi de décembre jusqu’au 1er janvier, 6h. The Red Nose application, presented by Operation Red Nose and Desjardins, is the perfect tool for a return home safely during the holidays season! KEY FEATURES • CALL: Using geolocation of your device, you may contact the coordinating center of the nearest Opération Nez rouge, knowing the home opener or alternative (taxi) hours for a return to home safe. • ALERT: Are you planning to celebrate? Set an alarm to remind you to call a friend, a taxi or Operation Red Nose. • WAITING: Get an estimate of the waiting time for the driver service in ten major centers: Laval, Montreal, Longueuil, Sherbrooke, Quebec, Trois-Rivières, Drummondville, Rimouski, Outaouais, Saguenay. • PHOTO: You're proud to have made the choice to volunteer or user? Display it and share it with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or email. • CONTEST: Register to enter the draw and maybe live the experience Desjardins in Quebec City Summer Festival! Desjardins members have an extra entry into the contest automatically. An Internet connection is needed to update the data, but the application also works without connection to data previously downloaded. The application is compatible with all phones with a camera and a GPS with Android version 2.3.3 or Android 4.0 or later to record a video testimonial release. The Red Nose application is functional throughout the year, allowing you to use most functions outside the dates of operation of the service. However, please note that the tabs and Call Waiting will be updated during the period of Operation Red Nose is on the first Friday in December until January 1, 6h.
release_text: Correction de bogues.

description: Farm sound effects allows you to turn your phone into a virtual farm and country side. Great fun with these farm background sounds. Farm sounds include things like horse sounds, pigs, chicken, cattle drive sounds, cows, sheep, barns, pastures, and more. All farm sound effects can be used as ringtones by simply long pressing a button. Enjoy these farm sound effects!

description: Party tonight as if it is your last! That is the spirit of the Night Out App. NOA gives a whole new dimension towards night life. In the past you went with friends towards the city to check if the hotspot was awesome. Now time has come that you already can see from your living room where your friends will go to, or what will be the hottest place tonight. Use the app during your holiday to discover in which unknown areas most people are heading to. At the same time you can check profiles of other bar visitors to get in touch with each other. On top of that there is the possibility to check with just one click away which events in your area take place. This can be done for huge events as well as for the karaoke contest in the local bar. NOA finds it important that all of this comes by taking into regard your privacy. You are the only one who decided to whom to show your location and who will be allowed to contact you. Features Night Out App: Check where your friends will be heading to and follow them step by step. Get in touch with people out of your living room and discover which bar the hottest place to be at the moment. Only one click away from new events at your area. Display your privacy as you like it to be! You are the one who decided to whom to show your location or who will be able to contact you. Add (new) friends to your friends list. Send a private message to your friends or unknown people in the bar. Invite friends from your friends list from Facebook or Twitter. Manage your favorite bars and check in no time which one you will need to go.

description: ***************************************************************** GolfSense device is required. ***************************************************************** GolfSense is the leading mobile 3D swing analysis product on the market. The GolfSense app is driven by a powerful motion engine that delivers in-depth analysis of your golf swing and presents it in a clear, easy-to-use form. Important information about each aspect of your swing, from your backswing all the way to the speed of your wrist rotation at ball contact and everything in between, GolfSense provides the most comprehensive feedback of any golf swing analyser on the market today. The GolfSense sensor (hardware) attaches easily to your golf glove. Simply slide the Velcro strap on your glove through the "belts" on the back of GolfSense and you're all set. Unlike other products that require you to strap devices onto each club before you swing, GolfSense conveniently rests on the back of your glove – always ready to go. Swing analysis features include: - 360 degree 3D Swing trace and swing plane view - Club head speed - Hand speed - Tempo analysis - Hip rotation - Swing plane comparison - Backswing shaft position - Trend analysis *** Important Note *** ---------------------- In order to use this application, you must have a GolfSense 3D Motion sensor. If you do not have one yet, please visit us at www.GolfSense.me to find a retail store near you or to purchase one on our website. Thank you for your interest and please reach out to us directly at support@golfsense.me if you have any direct feedback on the sensor hardware or our apps. We will do everything we can to keep improving our service for you.
release_text: Bug fixes
